name: Velvet Matte Lipstick
about: What it is:\ An ultra-pigmented matte lipstick delivering rich color with a soft, creamy feel. Highly pigmented with a soft, silk-like texture..Highlighted Ingredients:\ - Oils and Gelling Waxes: A comfortable matte finish without drying out lips or smudging..-Gelling Clay: Helps to ensure smooth and easy application...What Else You Need to Know: A lightweight formula saturated with pigments for vibrant, high-impact color that doesn't smudge or run and is comfortable to wear.This lipstick collection presents a range of iconic shades featuring rich nudes, oranges, pinks, reds, purples, and a shade of majestic green.
ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polyethylene, Polybutene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Talc, Dicalcium Phosphate, Ceresin, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcrystalline, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica Silylate, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tocopherol, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Alumina, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, BHT, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica, Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply using the sharp edge of the bullet to contour the lips..-Can also be applied on the cheeks and eyes.

reviews.review_title: The Velvet Matte Lipstick offers an impressive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Velvet Matte Lipstick Review  The Velvet Matte Lipstick offers an impressive blend of bold color and luxurious texture  . With its smooth, velvety finish, this lipstick provides a sophisticated matte look without the dryness often associated with matte formulas.  Pros:  Rich Color Payoff: The pigmentation is vibrant and true to the shade seen in the tube. One swipe is usually enough for full coverage. Comfortable Wear: Unlike many matte lipsticks, this one feels creamy and non-drying, making it comfortable to wear throughout the day. Long-Lasting: It has good staying power, surviving through meals and drinks with minimal touch-ups needed. Elegant Packaging: The sleek, stylish casing adds a touch of luxury to the application process. Cons:  Limited Shade Range: Depending on the brand, the selection of shades might be narrow, which could limit options for some users. Price Point: It might be on the higher end of the price spectrum, which could be a consideration for budget-conscious buyers. Overall, the Velvet Matte Lipstick is a great choice for anyone looking for a high-quality, matte finish with a comfortable wear. Its combination of vibrant color and luxurious texture makes it a standout option in the realm of matte lipsticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the shade Suzanne Sunset online during the lipstick sale because the colour looked like a beautiful nude pink and was disappointed to see that the colour looked NOTHING like the photos. It looked just straight up brown on my light-medium olive toned skin. Ended up giving it to my mother as she’s a lot darker than I am and it complimented her dark complexion. Besides the misleading colour, the formula was very nice and felt creamy and non drying. I dont think it’s worth the full price of $61 thought. And I Just wish the colours looked more accurate when buying online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is really nice, sturdy and great gold color. There is a slight scent, almost vanilla-y, which I don’t mind. The texture of the lipstick is smooth and it is pretty pigmented. The swatch I did is 3 swipes on my forearm. My complexion is tan/neutral but warm leaning. The color on me is a muted mauve-brown, a nice neutral. I let it dry for a few minutes and swiped at it, and it smudged so it can transfer. It’s matte but didn’t feel drying on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the luxurious feel of this matte lipstick in Eva Grape. The soft pinkish brown shade is beautiful and perfect for everyday wear, while the matte finish is elegant without feeling too drying. It glides on smoothly and lasts for hours without needing frequent touch-ups. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it could be a bit more moisturizing, but overall, it's a gorgeous lipstick that I enjoy using.

reviews.review_title: A nice touch to a no makeup makeup look

reviews.review_text: No scent. Gorgeous and creamy feel. Stays on very long and isn’t drying. Doesn’t leave cracks in your lips after long wear. Price is worth it! I honestly use this as lip stick and bronzer. Love the packaging. Received from Influenster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this Gucci #120 free from influenster for review. So this happens to be a great lipstick. As far as staying on it does its job for hours like you don't have to reapply it for hours. I gave it four stars because I am still looking for that lipstick that you can't retrace my steps from the night before, kind of lipstick. You know the one that doesn't come off on your cigarette or your drink or anything else you have your lips on. Thus, I just tapped a little powder on them and it stayed put. It kind of diluted the color a bit, so if I were buying I'd probably pick a bolder color of ya drink or smoke allot. Easy apply, color that lasts, kinda lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating formula, cute packaging & gorgeous shade

reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this formula, packaging and shade. It’s hydrating and not drying. It goes on really well and didn’t transfer to my teeth or sink into my lip lines. It has a slight essential oil smell to it that I like. The packaging is weighty and beautiful. The shade is the perfect beige, pink, brown that I love for my skin tone. I’ve been wearing this consistently since I received it and I don’t think I’ll ever go without it. This is hands down one of the best lip product formulas I’ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this lipstick. I've been to two weddings so far this year and this is definitely been my lipstick of chores. It lasts all day and it's just absolutely smooth and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Packing is luxurious and no scent. The texture feels and looks velvety and unique. Very pigmented and flattering. Does transfer a little but other than that its nice to have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. It is such a nice color and it was long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: received this product free for review from Influenster. This lipstick comes in a luxurious gold tube. The shade Sonia Light Beige runs cool and looks like a stone color against my warm light skin. It is highly pigmented and you only need 1-2 swipes to get full coverage. The consistency is creamy and thick. It has a satin feel on the lips, with a true matte look. If you have dry lips, this will accentuate the dry patches therefore I suggest you apply a moisturizer on before this lipstick. I live in a highly humid and hot climate where I sweat a lot and this lipstick only lasts about 1-2 hours on before I have to reapply. It is a really nice consistency but I would not pay full price for it. I feel like I can get a comparable drugstore lipstick for a fraction of the cost.

reviews.review_title: A good lipstick, but not long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review complimentary from Influenster. This lipstick has a thick creamy and matte consistency. The color runs cool and would in my opinion be best suited for cool tones. The pigmentation is great, it is very pigmented and covers the lips well. It has a thick consistency that isn’t too overly drying, however it does accentuate dry patches on the lips. I would recommend applying a lip moisturizer prior to wearing this lipstick. I do find this lipstick to rub off easily and last up to 1-2 hours before needing to reapply. I live in south Texas where it is hot and humid therefore that may be a factor in the short longevity of this lip product. I do like the packaging and how well made and luxurious it is. Overall I think this is a good lipstick to wear if you want a creamy matte look, however I would not pay full price for it. I feel like you could find comparable and longer lasting lipsticks at the drugstore for a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give more than 5 stars. I’m not someone who loves to wear lipstick because it creases and smudges or leaves an outline and I end up looking dumb. But this is the best lipstick I’ve ever tried. It went right into my purse. It stays on for such a long time. Doesn’t transfer to my cups or straws. It’s a stunning formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice matte lipstick and this is a true matte lipstick , it last a whole workday and for that I respect . The texture is good and does not transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is gorgeous and makes me feel luxurious. Inside a bullet shape, but this isn't an ordinary greasy or waxy bullet lippie. It applies with a medium build and can be layered to full WITHOUT the oily lip feel. It's also powdery soft, almost like wearing a liquid. The color does transfer, BUT it still looked amazing even with transfer. Also, I'm deep in skintone and had no issues wearing this without a lip pencil. It just looks like a pinky nude meant for me. I wore it to a concert where I finished my face at 4pm and ended the night at 2am and it was still holding on.

reviews.review_title: Not long lasting but still great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free as part of a promotion in exchange for my honest review. This is a nicely packaged, high end lipstick. I love the gucci imprint on it, I thought it was a nice touch. The lipstick is hydrating, and goes on smooth. It was definitely a bit more brown than I expected, and it wasn’t easy to put on a lighter coat, so you definitely need to love the color to use it. My only critique is that it is not long-lasting—it comes off fairly easy and wipes off fast, so you’ll need to reapply throughout the day, and it might transfer to your drinks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment I tried it, I was captivated by its luxurious feel and stunning finish.  The packaging is truly exquisite. The gold tube with intricate details exudes elegance and sophistication, making it a beautiful addition to any makeup bag or vanity. Applying this lipstick feels like a special occasion every time.  What sets this lipstick apart is its unique velvet matte formula. It glides on smoothly, offering rich pigmentation with just one swipe. The texture is soft and creamy, yet it dries down to a comfortable matte finish that doesn’t feel drying or heavy on the lips. It strikes the perfect balance, providing the classic matte look without compromising on comfort.  The staying power is impressive as well. I found that it lasted through meals and drinks with minimal touch-ups needed. The colors remain vibrant and true throughout the day, which is a huge plus.  The color range is versatile, offering everything from bold reds to soft nudes, ensuring there's a shade for every occasion and skin tone. Each shade is beautifully pigmented and delivers a luxurious, velvety finish.  Another lovely touch is the subtle fragrance. It has a light, pleasant scent that enhances the overall luxurious experience without being overpowering.  Overall, the Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick is a standout product that combines elegance, comfort, and long-lasting wear. It's a fantastic choice for anyone looking to add a touch of luxury to their makeup routine. Highly recommended for those who appreciate both beauty and performance in a lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Glides on nicely but fades too quickly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The box and the case of a Gucci lipstick is luxe. I feel like just the gold heft of the case of the lipstick ups my glamour game. The rest of my lipglosses and lipsticks in my ditty bag just wilt in their inferiority! That's where my happiness with Gucci lipstick ends. Not entirely - the matte lipstick goes on smoothly and doesn't have a chemical smell or taste and it doesn't feel tacky or sticky. It delivers on being matte and being the shade that the tube looks like - a very neutral lavender/beige that just doesn't suit my skintone. It only took one cup of coffee for it to start wearing off and that would be my main reason for not wanting to purchase another one, albeit even if it was in a color that was better meant for my coloring. I just don't prefer lip products that don't have a little more longevity. Re-applying several times during the day just isn't for me. What IS for me is receiving amazing cosmetics like this Gucci lipstick from Influenster complimentary in exchange for what is my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is a literal dream. Very creamy, highly perfumed like my grandmothers lipstick so it’s like a nostalgic blast from the past for me. The color is beautiful and the packaging is to die for. Engulfed in gold. Everything about this lipstick scream elegance. I love it so much, it’s been an honor to try it, thanks to GUCCI an influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci is a favorite brand of mine, but I'm not sure about this particular shade. It's a bit darker than I would wear, but still works with a planned makeup style. I didn't enjoy the fragrance coming from the product. It's a little floral, and I didn't want that on my mouth all day. However, I think that many makeup wearers would love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great packaging, there really doesn’t feel like it had a scent which I like. It’s very creamy and velvety. The shade is far like a mocha or espresso. Great pigmentation.

GUCCI ROUGE À LEVRES Mat in the color Eliza Ginger 122 is a luxurious lipstick known for its rich, velvety matte finish. The color is a warm, muted ginger shade that can add a sophisticated touch to various skin tones. The formula is praised for its creamy texture, long-lasting wear, and comfortable feel on the lips, without being too drying. The packaging is also elegant, reflecting GUCCI's signature style. If you like high-end, statement lip colors, this one could be a great addition to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

A minute after applying my lips felt like sandpaper. There so many hydrating matte lipsticks on the market…I cannot imagine sticking with the old sandpaper formula. It transfers like a dry erase marker and is completely gone after the first tiny sip of water. Gucci, this was a miss.

reviews.review_text: I got sent this item for free from Influenster for review purposes. I received the color Eva Grape and it is such a beautiful lipstick formula. It did have some transfer but I expect that with traditional lipstick. I applied smoothly without any patchiness. I does have a perfume scent but it’s not at all overbearing and goes away after a while. It lasted a pretty good amount of time without fading and no feathering outside of my lip lines! 9.5/10!

Available in a wide range of shades, it caters to every skin tone and occasion, from bold reds to subtle nudes. Overall, the Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick combines elegance, performance, and comfort, making it a must-have for those seeking high-quality, statement-making lip color.

reviews.review_text: This is a luxury lipstick worth the price. The tube itself has a nice weight to it, and the gold linear pattern looks and feels elegant. I'm very impressed by the matte formula, it swipes on like a satin but has a matte finish. Extremely comfortable to wear, and has decent lasting power. I wore this to a party and only reapplied 1x over the course of 6 hrs. If I had to rebuild my makeup collection I would purchase this. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moment I applied this Gucci lipstick, I knew I was in for a treat. The color is a pretty deep, brown rosy pink hue on my lips. The pigmentation is also impressive, with a rich, even color that looks great on its own or paired with other products.   But what truly sets this lipstick apart is its incredible formula. Despite being a matte, it glides on effortlessly, with no dragging or tugging on the lips. The texture is surprisingly soft and buttery, making it a joy to apply.   This lipstick also has great wearing power and pretty much stays put and intact even after eating or drinking. There is extremely minimal transfer.   The applicator tube is also a beautiful, gold color and classy looking.    My tips for this product is to make sure your lips are well-moisturized and exfoliated before applying, as this will help the lipstick go on smoothly and evenly. Additionally, applying a lip liner first can create a beautifully defined line or border if that's your style. And if you're feeling extra fancy, this lipstick makes an amazing base for adding a lip gloss on top. I posted a photo with and without lip gloss added on top. The possibilities are endless!   Overall, I am impressed with this Gucci lipstick and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality, long-lasting matte shade that's easy to apply and looks fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so pleased when I opened my package and found a gorgeous lipstick shade in the color, Suzanne Sunset! I tried it on right away and formed some very thoughtful ideas about it! The first thing that I noticed, after noting the shade of it, was that it was very lightweight and not heavy at all. Even more so though, was that even though it was lightweight, it was very pigmented! The color was perfect for me, as I don’t wear reds or pinks usually. I loved that it was a more nude tone and natural shade. Gliding smoothly across both my top and bottom lip, it felt rich and creamy, yet still not heavy at all.     Since I always research my make up products before I use them, I found that the Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick was free of phthalates, sulfates, and parabens! Using a product which is more natural is important to me and the Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick did not disappoint me! After wearing it for several hours I didn’t notice any smudges or dryness to my lips. And did I mention the packaging? The packaging was simple, yet elegant. It comes in a gold tone tube and has vertical grooving all the way around it. I would highly recommend the Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick in Suzanne Sunset if you enjoy wearing a creamy, smudge-proof matte lipstick in a more nude shade that embodies elegant packaging.

reviews.review_text: I love this matte look this lipstick is amazing keeps my lips hydrated all the time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Gucci lip color is beautiful. It reminds me of old school Hollywood. I love it. The tub is made of a heavier material. You can tell it's a higher end product. The lip stick goes on smooth. I like how well it stays on when I layer it with my clear lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning packaging, superior formula and pigmentation, making it a worthy lipstick. Long lasting lipstick, matte and satin offering the best durability.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this formula and color! The packaging is really pretty and the lipstick itself is stunning. It’s goes on smooth and light and doesn’t even feel like you’re wearing anything. The color payoff is good and this shade is a my lips but better look. This left my lips feeling moisturized and gave this beautiful halo blurring look. This is going to be my new everyday shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color.  Compliment my skin tone perfectly.  I like that it is not bright or shiny.  Gives the lips a matte, smooth finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely deep color; definitely more of a moody or gothy look. Looks great with my lighter complexion. It has a slight powdery perfumed scent to it. Packaging is gorgeous but I wish the lipstick had more staying power. It wipes off so easily you need to reapply even after sipping a drink. I would opt for on eof the longer lasting lipsticks over this one I think.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your beige tone lipstick collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci never let me down with its good quality, hydrating, and nice color lipstick. I got Eliza Ginger which is a beige tone that I have never tried before with any brand. But I love this! It gave me a shade of pinky beige and turned not to matte and dry. It perfectly fit on my lips with or without makeup on. Its texture is really smooth and easy to apply on without leaving any cast. Will buy more colors to try out! I am in love with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the satiny feel of this lipstick. My lips feel hydrated and smooth. The color is a very pale shade and is very pretty. It lasts longer than a normal lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the most beautiful lipstick containers I’ve never had. Lipstick is so soft like velvet and goes on so smooth. I paired it with a MAC liner called spice and it looks absolutely amazing. Color holds up really well especially when eating or wiping your mouth. Very little transfer from lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am truly impressed by this lipstick. And yes I consider myself a lipstick aficionado! The tube is a sleek gold metal that looks luxe. The matte texture is beautiful and feels great on the lips. The very pointed edge allows you to use it as a liner and then easily fill in the lips from there. I immediately received a compliment when I wore this shade. It reminds me of the popular 90’s brownish berry lip shades that looked very good on most skin tones. This lipstick lasted and did not fade out leaving a ring of color but just faded off over time. I need another shade to add to my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful formula! It’s not drying whatsoever. The staying power is pretty strong. I got the shade “Fanny rose” and it looks more nude/brown than pink in person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! The packaging is gorgeous and the lipstick itself is just beautiful. It goes on so smooth and isn’t sticky like some other lipsticks. I will be wearing this over and over!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful color! Goes on smooth and lasts! Doesn’t dry and flake off like most lip stick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has got to be my favorite lipstick as it is not easy transferable not only that, but it looks really nice on my lips  when applied I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this gucci lipstick because it has a gentle scent and good moisturizing, beautiful color, it makes my lips very attractive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg!! This is such a classy beautiful lipstick!! I love everything about it!! It has a great all-gold design with the logo just on top which makes it so simple and yet so elegant and beautiful! I love the burnt-red brown / ginger color!! It might look very dark but it comes on so beautiful and well-balanced ginger brown! I have burgundy-red hair color and it matches perfectly! It lasts all day of drinking even eating and it's 100% transfer-proof!! I love the fresh floral scent!! I would definitely be buying more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very velvety like the name suggests. Not as drying or crummy like other matte lipsticks. Not a must have but pretty good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this lip stick. It’s a nice neutral, it’s called beige but I would really call it a beige pink. It stays on well and looks great on. My only draw back is I felt like it dried my lips out a little. But I would definitely recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci beauty Velvet Matte Lipstick, is a luxurious lipstick with a high pigmentation. It comes in a gorgeous packaging, its texture is silky and it has a delicate flowerlike scent. Mine is “ Sonia Light Beige” which is a beautiful nude that doesn’t transfer. I love it!!

reviews.review_title: Smells so good and goes on smooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick. It goes on so velvety smooth.. the color is amazing and stays on even after eating greasy food Elsa smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thoroughly impressed with the GUCCI NEUTRALS Mat lipstick in Fanny Rose 222! This lipstick has become a new favorite of mine.  The color is stunning, yet understated, making it perfect for daily wear.  What sets it apart is its moisturizing and nourishing formula that keeps my lips hydrated and comfortable all day.  The lipstick lasts for several hours without needing touch-ups, and I appreciate the convenient packaging - a sleek, gold tube with a secure click closure that prevents accidental openings while traveling. Plus, it smells amazing! Overall,  I'm thoroughly satisfied and would definitely purchase more in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the quality. The name in it, the case it comes in. Makes you feel fancy. The color is eh. This color blends with my own coloring a lot but that being said, it will be great when I’m trying to be more low key but want something. Goes on well. It’s matte so no shine but you can always use a different gloss. Maybe I just need a different color. I got for free for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome lipstick that truly made me stand out during special occasions! The overall packaging and lipstick casing are elegant and luxurious. The color is truly amazing and complements my look perfectly. It even has a great scent! It’s long lasting and makes me feel special at family gatherings and informal socials. I like the glossy finish and how easy and convenient it is to apply and transfer onto my lips. I recommend this product to others based on quality and color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Gucci matte lipstick comes in the most pretty, sophisticated gold case. The color was pretty in the tube but did not look the best on my lips. Even though it wasn't transfer proof, the color lasted a good 4 hours on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so in love of this lipstick, the quality of the formula is so amazing! I love the shade and the matte finish. It came in a very fancy packaging, the scent is great, smell just like flowers. I totally gonna try another shades.

reviews.review_title: Great lipstick to add to collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging was so nice! The pigment and the shade of this lipstick is amazing. Doesn’t have an overpowering scent and feels soft on the lips while having minimal transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product had great color payoff and had a great consistency with the formula. It’s long lasting and doesn’t smudge as easily as a lot of others I’ve tried. The packaging is super sleek and aesthetically pleasing to look at!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

I did like the way it just glides right on my lips. I noticed it didn’t leave any marks on my cup when I tried it out to see if it would stay on .  It was easy to take off.  It was easy to put on.  It did transfer well. I am a little pale so this color was a little too dark for me but it is a very pretty color. I would recommend this to someone who has a darker complexion than me. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick, the color it’s pretty and its really smooth, has a great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous compact packaging. Applies smoothly and not too dry a consistency for a matte lip. Overall the color was just a little darker for me than I was used to. I really liked the consistency of the lipstick, and it was more moisturizing than a normal matte, I’m just super pale and it felt like a darker more campy color than I was expecting and am used to wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging was okay. Love the velvet texture and I try to gently apply the lipstick since there a lot of complains about it falling off, so far the lipstick still intact . There no scent and the lipstick design is cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh! This lipstick comes in a beautiful packaging! Even the box is pretty! The color I received was “Eliza Ginger” a cool brown. Beautiful pay off ! Had mine not come in messed up, it would’ve been perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice smooth buttery feel, has a strong powdered floral scent, has really good pigment and is a really pretty matte finish. Smudges not that much, no transfer, but a soft shadow smear with pressure. Really pretty lipstick nice high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This lipstick is fabulous! If glides on silky smooth and the color is gorgeous! The packaging is beautiful and elegant. There is no scent to the lipstick and it lasts for hours!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my make up routine for my lips
reviews.review_text: After using this product over a couple days on my lips, the texture is really nice. The color is amazing. It matches my own color. Very good product. I would recommend this lipstick and if you don’t believe me, try it yourself you really would like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s very vibrant and smooth feeling, absolutely stunning! I This lipstick was very pigmented. It had full coverage in just one swipe and went on smoothly. The packaging is beautiful and high quality! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade on my lips literally fleshes in with my complexion. The perfect nude!!! It has a perfume to it but not too overbearing. The packaging is simple but sophisticated. Goes on smooth like silk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Matte but very smooth and stays put. Very 90s, I love the way it feels and looks as it’s very full coverage as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You want a review, Influenster? Here's your review. I waited over two months to receive this terrible Gucci lipstick. Why is it terrible, you ask? Well, let me tell you. I requested a different color, entirely, but was sent this atrocity. This is, quite possibly, the worst color to exist in a lipstick. It doesn't match my skin tone and I don't like the color at all. I also don't like the texture. It goes on like mud. I would not recommend this to anyone. Fanny Rose? Who names a lipstick fanny rose?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is the most complete one I have used. It provides both moisture as well as longevity. The color choices are all lovely and offer something to every skin type. This lipstick is worth every penny. It's almost invisible feeling when wearing it. It's the perfect color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the packaging for this product. The box was really cute, and the lipstick tube was solid gold and beautiful. I enjoyed how it felt as I applied it to my lips. The color was pretty, but unfortunately, it just wasn't the right shade for me. I would like to find my perfect shade and give it another try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love love love this lip colour. It’s so pretty and goes on so smoothly! I definitely want to get more colors. It doesn’t really have a scent. The box is so pretty as well and definitely looks high end. My fianc\e wanted to give me a kiss as soon as he saw it on me so it must have looked good to him too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this would be way too dark but it was a perfect blend of brown and pink that worked so well on my skin. Is a great color that has a bit of drama but can still be worn everyday. The texture was so soft and velvety with a beautiful finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci Rouge Mat Lipstick in Fanny Rose is an absolute stunner! The color is a perfect balance of bold and feminine, making it suitable for all occasions. The matte finish gives a sophisticated look that lasts all day without drying out the lips. The packaging is luxurious and the formula is highly pigmented. I would highly recommend this lipstick for anyone looking to make a statement with their lip color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Most fancy packaging with worst material. The lipstick gets break even after 2-3 usage. The color I received is 220 Suzanne Sunset,  not sure why it says Suzanne Sunset-Pink because on brown skin, it just looks nude. I received this lipstick complimentary for testing purposes for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging on this Gucci lipstick is amazing. The scent and texture are brilliant. My daughter loves the color pigment. She says it transfers smoothly to her lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this lipstick! The color, the finish, and the smell are amazing. I also love the texture because it's not too moisturizing and transferable like other lipsticks. Also the packaging is gorgeous! Love Gucci!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice quality matte lipstick. What more can you expect from Gucci! The color is very unique and goes well with most dark shaded garments. Perfect for nights out. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m pretty sure this would be a very pretty color on someone else. However I did not get the right color and this color does not compliment my skin tone at all. I wish it was something more I could say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is beyond my expectations. It is a matte finish, but unlike my other lipsticks it does not dry the lips but keeps them moisturized. This is such a lovely shade that can be worn for any occasion. In my opinion it is so worth trying. It also lasted for a while on lips. Give it a try, this is such a luxurious product that feels wonderful on lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Gucci lipstick is luxurious. From the packaging to the application. The color is beautiful. It goes on very smooth, matte, does not feel drying (like some lipsticks do) and the wear lasts. I usually prefer gloss over lipstick but this one may make me reconsider. I think it pairs well with my Chanel lip liner in nude.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color.  Very smooth on lips.  Used with brown lip liner and used with brown lip liner, the lipstick is very smooth.  Beautiful color.  Moisturize.  So in love with Gucci matte lipstick.  This lipstick is so vibrant, I love everything about it.  The color is very beautiful.  I can't stop taking them!    I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster for sending Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick. Lovely package and lipstick case. Formula is creamy and full bodied- but in a matte lipstick. Deeply pigmented. Just wish like most lipsticks it had more staying power. Transfers easily when eating or drinking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm wearing the Suzanne Sunset Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick, and I love it. The ultra-pigmented formula delivers rich color with a soft, creamy feel. It has a silk-like texture that feels comfortable and doesn't dry out my lips. The oils and gelling waxes provide a matte finish without smudging, and the gelling clay ensures smooth, easy application. It's lightweight, vibrant, and stays put without running or smudging, making it perfect for all-day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is very nice! It's heavy which is very nice! It does have a heavier scent to it so I wouldn't recommend if sensitive to stronger scents but it is nice I love the color it shows brownish on camera but it's a very rich Berry color. It does dry down and 1 had a few drinks today and it stayed not sure if it's really transfer proof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super pretty color and elegant design. Love the matte finish and how silky it feels going in. Long lasting and doesn’t leave my lips feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice lipstick, and they have it in such a nice container. The color is very clean and neutral and works well with any style you are going for. There isn't too much of a scent, but what I smell is pleasant. The texture is soft and smooth, and it goes on easily. I highly recommend this Gucci lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This new collection of nudes are perfection. Color is gorgeous. Makes your lips voluptuous and sensual, leaving you feeling so sexy !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE Gucci lipsticks, and this color is fire! BUT, it broke after only 3 uses! The actual lipstick broke at the base, as if it wasn’t manufactured correctly, and now it’s so difficult to use straight from the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these lipsticks. The colors are gorgeous and last without drying or bleeding. Only a 4 because 2 of them the lipstick broke and I have to be careful applying so it doesn’t break in half like my first one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In love with Gucci lipsticks, but there’s an error in the description color. If you want to know what 702 looks like go see 606. This dark Lilac they put for 702 is not the right color. It’s 606 that has the right color for 702.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it doesn't look like the color at all that shows in the picture.  it is very light rose nude . pretty color but very different from the picture above.  very drying formula.  flakes and enhance lip lines.  but I will keep it and see if I can make it work because I really like the shade . it has my lips but better look to it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty color.  Goes on smooth.  Wear with brown lip liner and  Wear with brown lip liners very smooth application. Beautiful color.  Stay hydrated.  I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So in love with Gucci matte lipsticks. This one is so vibrant I love everything about it. Color is so beautiful. I can’t get enough of them !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Color is perfect for summer. Vibrant and so youthful that’s how this lipstick makes you feel. I love Gucci Matte lipsticks this is my 3rd shade. Simply classy and Sexy !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. The color is absolutely gorgeous. It is a dark orange red, like a terracotta red. I paired it with a red lipliner and thought it went well together. Unlike what it says on the product page, it can be very drying on the lips and it does smear if not properly set with liner or powder on top. I didn’t notice the dryness as much when I was wearing it but when I removed it. Even wearing a lip balm underneath didn’t help improve it very much.  I would definitely consider buying the satin version of this just wish this one was more hydrating as stated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color. On my pale skin, it’s a true rusty red (burnt orange red). The formula is buttery and yet resists transfer. Lots of fragrance to which I’m sensitive, but so far I haven’t had any negative reaction to the strong scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!! What an amazing color. Not to fuchsia and not to red. It’s not at all drying after wearing all day. I tried the MAC Taboo which looked similar but Gucci is the clear winner as far as getting this color spot on perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful package and beautiful formula. Fragrance was not best for me but I’m ok with it. Only thing negative for me was color on picture was really different. Suzanne sunset looked like  warm brown on picture, but actually muted beige pink on my lip. It’s still beautiful color but that was￼not I wanted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is amazing, the colour is stunning. If you have it on your wish list, splurge and get it! The velvety texture is super hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say is WOW. This has been on my wishlist for a while, finally caved. The formula is something else. The color-Perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy formula but the smell is sooo strong and unpleasant to me. A little drying and thick as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful! I love it. I bought two colors and will be buying more. It goes on nice and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color. However it is flawed. It appears to melt, not stay solid. Gets everywhere. I purchased 3 thinking that the others would be ok. But was not. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the quality and the colour intensity! Long lasting and goes on well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful color!! as you can see it looks totally different in the light as it does in the shade.  direct light brings out a more coral side to the lipstick that I love!  it is so creamy and smooth and apllies beautifully.  the acent is very nostalgic classic lipstick from my childhood (this is how I remember my grandma's lipstick smelling- in a good way).  it doesn't need a liner but I paired it with Tarte maracuja lip liner in dusty rose to give a more defined edge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting, smooth, stunning color. I will be purchasing another shade. Lipstick stayed on for 7+ hours and even after eating a meal did not need a retouch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second shade and they are so beautiful, i’m planning on getting more shades. The texture is smooth and although it’s matte, it doesn’t dry lips so much. Apply tatcha lip mask under and you’re all set. Colors are STUNNING!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my most trusted matte lipstick. yes it dries out the lips a little - its matte! - but is buttery soft and highly pigmented. recommend janet rust for olive skins! and the package is so gorgeous. Was worried it would scratch wasily but it didnt!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color in the picture and the color in person are too different colors. I wanted the one in the picture  . just spent 50 bucks on a color that it was not what I thought it was.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous pigmentation and velvety application. I never usually wear dark lipstick, but this is such a vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have several shades but this one smudges so bad ! I used liner, primer , all the tricks and it never failed this one smudged terribly. Love the other shades but this one doesn’t do it for me.

reviews.review_title: I love how unique this shade is
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can be a bit hard to use - I would recommend applying, blotting very well, and then applying again to get a good color pay off, this could just be the green but it is slightly sheer so building works best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
