reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: loved first swipe. bold color, creamy smooth matte. I would suggest making sure your lips are moisturized first though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really underwhelmed by the formula. It is powdery matte. The colour swatches do no justice so I can’t wear this shade without a red lipliner underneath, otherwise it looks peach. I love luxury matte lipsticks from Chanel, Burberry and Armani but Gucci really missed their mark. The bottle is beautiful but it’s very overpriced. It looks cheap on and wears badly. I wouldn’t recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick in mat... so much I bought it in satin as well but they are not the same. This mat is my fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color and last is beautiful, but it literally broke after two uses. I have to apply with my finger now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unique colors and feels nice on lips but doesn't last at all. Packaging is pretty though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a red lip. I like this one b/c it doesn’t require a liner and has the perfect amount of orange. However, I can tell its fragile and will break with even regular application pressure. So I have to apply it carefully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment is great but this matte smudges SO easily and it broke after only 5 uses. Definitely not up to standard for such a luxury product. So disappointed because this was my yearly splurge and now I can't use it without it being a super messy experience. So many people are saying it's broken on them too, DON'T BUY THIS!!!

reviews.review_title: Great bright on trend matte lipstick!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a few of these when they were half price for Lipstick Day, I have to say the colours are much different in person than they show up online so a few of them went back but ended up keeping 2 - Ruby Firelight and shade 300 (bright orange) and wished I had kept Patricia Pink (bright pink).  At first glance in the tube I thought they would be too dark (I usually wear light nudes) but instead they are just bright.  I never get compliments on my lipstick but with these I have received several compliments from strangers and think it is due to the bright matte that is very on trend at the moment.  The packaging is luxe and what you would expect from Gucci.  The actual formula is a little different, as many have commented it is VERY chalky (why I have 4 stars) so will need to apply a few coats and even then it is still quite chalky up close but from a distance it is a beautiful saturated colour on the lips.  It is quite long lasting and doesn't change your lip colour as it is fading like some other lipsticks.  It is on the dry side which is expected with a matte lipsticks but not super uncomfortable.  I am so glad I had the opportunity to get them at a reduced price to try them out but would not pay full price for them.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 401 Three Wise Girls - intense pinky red
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's broken after one use.. I've never had such an issue with other high-end Matte lipstick and with a $60 price this is just insane

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Chalky & patchy look on the lips. Color settled into all the lines and essentuated any dry areas on the lips. The formula itself is soft but holy smokes it literally looks like chalk. I could not find any way to melt the color into my lips. looks pretty from far away but if you get too close u can see all the lines and patchiness of this Lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Drying, settled in my lip lines a bit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Peggy taupe and painted veil. Colors are nice but drying on lips and smells like crayon. I love the satin formula though. Those are amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty color. It brightens my complexion. Not drying and so smooth to apply. Will check out other shades. Im hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the shade but the bullet broke off on my 3rd use which made me super sad. The formula is really nice but I’m hesitant to repurchase for the price, I’m scared it’ll just break again

reviews.review_title: for the price, I would expect a nicer smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the colour is nice, but the lipstick has an awful smell.  like crayons.  or cheap old lipstick.   there are so many more lipsticks exactly like this that don't stink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really great matte color. Stays long and very dramatic and pretty. I love it. Can't give 5 stars because Gucci is NOT cruelty free. Too bad. Won't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My search is over!!! I’ve been looking for a true beige since MAC’s Folio of years gone past.  THANK YOU GUCCI! Carol Beige #103 is perfect not to mention the amazing texture. ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the opaque coverage, the vibrant color, and the staying power. Not uncomfortably dry for a matte lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have 7 of these lipsticks, and it's my favorite matte formula.  it goes on super smooth, isn't drying, and has great staying power.  I also love the range of nude beige shades because they're  true neutral beige, not pink, and I haven't been able to find colors like them in other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 2nd matte lipstick from Gucci. My first one is 103 which I absolutely love. 104 is a light warm brown that’s is very versatile and goes on so nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this formula and color. If you can afford it, buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried dozens of lipsticks at Sephora and department stores to find my perfect workweek red. I purchased the Chanel liquid Daring Red, Shiseido’s Ginza Red and Gucci’s Odalie Red. Gucci is my favorite to use hands down, because of the versatile pigmentation formula (can be a subtle stain or a full on party), buttery-smooth application and feel on the lips (not drying), longevity (with a universal lip liner), and the scent. The entire experience is luxurious, start to finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Look and feels lovely!  This product is worth it! It stays in place and it will last throughout your day.💋

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: perfect matte finish lipstick. The color is incredibly saturated, and it lasts thru drinks and meals with only a bit of touch up. I like that it's easy and comfortable to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are very soft.  I’ve broken two already during application. Do NOT turn them up too far. The nude colors are pretty.

Stunning-this will be my new goto red for the rest of the year- beautiful red with slight tones of orange- just enough for spring and summer with out over doing it- omg this is it for me. Excellent wuality. A very good matte lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The entire tube of lipstick fell out of the holder when I opened it and fell on the ground while I was outside. I just got this delivered and I can’t use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!  Even though it's matte it's not drying and very hydrating. Also the wonderful color doesn't seem to bleed (I haven't used a pencil with it).  Am enjoying wearing it.

Probably one of the worst lipsticks I’ve ever bought at this price point. It broke within a month of buying.  Opened it to use and was snapped. Colour doesn’t last more than a few hours. Very disappointed

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous shade for very fair complexions
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very fair (NW10, light blonde, green eyes) and don't normally have much luck with darker shades. I was expecting this was going to be a return for me, but this shade is absolutely gorgeous on. Even just trying this colour on a bare face was incredibly flattering. On me, it wears like a deep grape with just a hint of red - I don't think I've ever tried a colour quite like this before. Like all the other reviews have stated, it's incredible that this is a matte formula, because it glides on with the smooth easy consistency of the cushiest velvet finish, even on my dry winter lips. Love love love, can't wait to stock up on these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have three matte colors and one satin.  Easy to see this lipstick is a favorite. The satin I have is shade 017, A Royal Scandal, a unique and rare cool brown, and may be discontinued. I’ve never found a dupe for that shade. The mattes can be full coverage.  The pigments are rich and true. However, be aware that the matte lipsticks are much drier (less emollient) than the other types.  One of my matte lipsticks fell out, not broke off, at the base. That’s the reason for one less star.

reviews.review_title: Love it but after drink or food..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the quality, color, strong pigment, luxurious design, but before i drink or eat, and it so sad because it feels  so comfortable on my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pictures and the swatch look beautiful. But when it goes on, it comes off looking very Gray. It is also very heavily scented like perfume. And with the lips right underneath the nose… smh will return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lipstick because of the brilliant pigmentation and the overall luxe look. I had never purchased anything from Gucci as far as hair or makeup so I decided to give it a try. well the color was just as brilliant as I imagined it would be however this lipstick does not stay on your lips for more than 30 minutes. I honestly could not believe how quickly it disappeared. I found myself reapplying all throughout the day. I have nice moisturized lips so I'm not sure what the problem was but it was a complete waste of money for me because although I love the color the wear payoff is trash. for $45 I should have left it in the store!

reviews.review_title: Color is pretty but it doesn't last long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is pretty but it doesn't last long and for $45 I expect it to last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color and feel of this lipstick is great but it’s not a matte. Much like the PML “matte” formula, it definitely has a sheen to it which by definition would put it in the satin category. I’m kind of shocked that more people aren’t pointing this out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first experience with Gucci lipstick, color Coral Beige. I’m fair skin with chestnut hair and faded freckles. I warm up my look with tanners etc but am still pretty fair. Lipsticks usually don’t look good on me, but this is really beautiful. The lipstick lipstick itself is creamy and smooth with a velvety matte finishe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lasted a whole work shift without reapplication, lasted through eating and drinking -faded a little through this but was still there. Very unique matte texture. Small amount for full size though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this lipstick!!! It was beautiful on!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this lipstick! Stays on for hours. Beautiful orange color! Don’t have to constantly reapply every so often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Non-stop compliments on this shade. Had to wait for it to be back in stock and was so excited to get it! This shade seems like it would be extreme but it actually works for every day wear, it has excellent longevity, and lasted all day. Beautiful matte shade! I have not had any issues with it breaking as others as mentioned but recommend storing appropriately and using lightly, it has good pigment so no need to push hard! Wish there were some more pastels like this- I did buy the coral also!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read a lot of reviews before purchase but turned out to be kind of disappointing. The color is nice but it is super dry and not very long lasting

reviews.review_title: Disappointing quality and strange grandma smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this lipstick mostly for the color (which is a very lovely coral) and the packaging and those turned out to be the only two good things unfortunately (hence the two stars). This lipstick has a strange smell added that I really dislike and the texture kind of smears around and doesn't have any staying power. The final straw was the lipstick completely falling out of the tube in my purse. Very disappointed in the quality considering the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful and versatile application! A bit drying (no more than any other matte lipstick) but wears beautifully while leaving a nice stain on the lips. I like that I can blot this over chapstick for a just bitten Parisian casual look or apply it neatly for a more dramatic, sophisticated look. Best part? It makes the best cream-to-matte blush, too!  A few dabs blended onto the apples of each cheek and VOILA! Perfectly flushed cheeks to pair with lips. The tube is perfectly weighted as well - feels decadent. One star off for price and lack of emollient (and because I'm incredibly picky)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very classic retro color, sexy and very pigment, the only down side is it cracks around the center lips after hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous shade with a creamy formula.  I found this more strongly violet scented than my previous shade of Patricia Pink.  I’m giving it three stars because the top of the lipstick arrived smashed.  The box was immaculate so something happened where the tube is defective. The shade is so beautiful, I will try to repurchase. However, for the high price point, the lipstick should arrive pristine and this didn’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of matte lipsticks and these are one of the best I've tried. The colors are quite opaque and the formula is comfortable and non-drying - which, for me, is a critical requirement. Love before breakfast, Agatha Orange, and Odalie Red are hands down my favorite summer lipstick shades.

reviews.review_title: loved it but not worth the price. sorry Gucci!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shade and texture but twice in a row they’ve come unattached from the base. It’s very upsetting as these are luxury lipsticks. I bought three matching in this shade for me and my sister and my mother (2/3 have broken off from the base). I even returned mine hoping it was just me but the one I exchanged for did it also. Very very disappointing after spending so much on these. I’m gonna continue to use it but I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone based on the price and my experience. Also they kind of pill if you don’t blot of the excess. Just not giving luxury unfortunately.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous color and matte finish. I really enjoy the formula, the only think I’ll say is that it is a bit drying but that is too be expected with mattes ofc. Also the smell is very much old woman Avon lipstick but I secretly like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this man. This is so pigmented. It is soft texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: color is lighter than photo, not worth price, very awful smell & taste. SUPER DISAPPOINTED , especially at this price...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't think I've fallen in love with a color so quickly. Idk if it's because my niece picked the color that makes it feel special, but it pops nicely on my med-deep golden skintone. The formula is also nice and velvety.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very dissapointed. These has nothing incommon with the color that is shown in every picture It's orange!!!!!! :'(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Had to return - the fragrance on these was really strong and off-putting.  It is supposed to be violet, but it smells like it came from your grandmother's makeup bag - and not in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Patricia Pink is a beautiful candy pink.  The formula is super grainy and a tad finicky to work with.  However, the color is gorgeous and looks beautiful once applied.  I didn’t detect a strong fragrance at all.  I would only purchase again if I was in love with the shade.  The price point is high considering the formula’s imperfections. However, the shade is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: VERY BRIGHT. Not for the weary. This shade is much brighter than I anticipated. It has a sort of mod, 60s vibe that is fun, but not great for daily use or going to the office. It is not subtle at all. Would be great for a costume or special party event, but not for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not only is the color and finish gorgeous, but the staying power is wondrous! Got through an entire meal, and absolutely no smudging or need for reapplication! That’s the kind of quality I look for in a lipstick!!  5/5 for color and finish 5/5 for long lasting and no smudge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lipstick as a gift, it is so lovely! I would recommend this lipstick, it goes on very smooth and is very creamy. Heads up, It does not have long staying power, and does need to be reapplied after a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color & how smoothly it goes on! It stays on throughout the day. I would definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My ideal matte red lip. (Gucci Goldie Red is too orange for me, but it's a close second).  Pros: non-drying, truly matte, long-wear, doesn't feather, can be blotted out, applies like butter (so soft), beautiful packaging, long-lasting, subtle sugared violet scent  Cons: cost  I love this formula. I use a liner for crisp lines, or blot out for a diffused look. It's the best non-drying matte I've found and this red is my ideal (comparable to MAC Russian Red). It still looks good 6hrs later, and even holds up pretty well with coffee and light snacking. For the cost, I could get a more affordable product but I love this formula so much and lipsticks last forever... I'll definitely rebuy when I run out.  The scent is the Gucci signature, sugared violet, and it reminds me of Parma Violet candies. It's subtle and I like it, but I understand why some people who are sensitive to fragrance might not. For me the scent fades quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick so much. But it easily gone after drink or two.  My 208 is perfect for my skin

reviews.review_title: Color great.. too soft. Will definitely break
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color but lipstick consistency is too soft. Expect breakage No way you can apply this to your lips with a swipe without breakage  I have to use it very lightly and then finish with a lip brush Also when applied it does not go on smoothly. You def have to even it out with a brush I will not use this as a carry in purse lipstick. I’m only keeping it as I like the color.. way to $$$ for all that’s wrong with it
I used this lipstick 2 times and the lipstick broke. I’m very disappointed with this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke during the first application. Next time I’ll just set the money on fire; at least that doesn’t require shipping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the lipstick - it’s texture and pigmentation. Unfortunately, it matches with the color of my skin and I find the picture of the shade misleading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A gorgeous lip shade, very natural and smooth on the lips! I think this would be stunning on a variety of different skin tones as well! Definitely will be perfect for summer!!!

reviews.review_title: must have in your lipstick collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci lipstick are my absolutely favorite the texture and color is amazing. The color stays on very well and last for hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a big fan of red lips, but I wanted something a little different than the usual. Three Wise Girls is an underrated shade. It’s a very classic pinky red color but warm toned not cool. A sophisticated but fun color! The matte formula is excellent. No weird flaking or gathering into cracks on my lips, and not drying at all. It sets down and stays (though I reapply after eating). The smell does not bother me, it’s faint. I was worried about this.   I did see the other reviews where the bullet came out of the component and I will say mine seems a little loose. I’m trying to only push the lipstick up as little as I need when I’m applying and treating it very delicately. Gucci beauty has got some quality control to do in this regard.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Absolutely love this lipstick and bronzer, obsessed with color. Just purchased two more shades.

reviews.review_title: so velvety and a beautiful color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: aside from the gorgeous packaging, the lipstick itself is amazing. such a beautiful color and it feels like velvet going on your lips. i’m serious. it’s so smooth going on, and it doesn’t settle into the lines of your lips like other matte lipsticks do. the only issue i’ve had is transferring, but even that’s not bad. the color is still on your lips, with minimal transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip stick texture & color. It took me a long time to find the perfect red shade that suits my olive skin tone. Love love love this. This makes you look beautiful.

The color is beautiful! However I was pretty disappointed on the quality of the lipstick. It broke like the second time I used it, I was applying it and it just broke off. I can’t take it anywhere because the whole thing came apart and it stains everything! Like the whole lipstick broke off the bottom so it’s stuck on the top of the lid. I was super sad about it. I won’t be buying this again. It never happened to me with any other brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fell apart after a few uses. Id love to get a full refund. I originally was skeptical as the color appeared chalky but ended up keeping it and now it’s a mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of my favorite lipsticks. Vibrant color and very pigmented. Nice smooth matte that applies beautifully and it stays along time on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Opened the tube for the first time and it looked used/damaged. The tube came completely out as well. For the price this is unacceptable and want a refund. Shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved everything about this lipstick. The color is amazing and doesn’t make my lips dry. It’s so soft and applies perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is beautiful everything I want in a lipstick feels amazing on the lips the color is absolutely stunning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I don't know what is going on with Sephora's product photos, but definitely check the Gucci website for the accurate colors. I had been eyeing up color 702 for awhile on Gucci's website and finally decided to order it with a few other things I was getting from Sephora. I'm really happy with the color - even though I have very fair skin I think the color compliments me well. It is bright and fun (nothing like how Sephora has it pictured), so I am glad what I got was the actual color and not Sephora's misrepresentation of it. The formula is great - doesn't dry me out and has quickly become my favorite fun lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is wonderful, matte but soft and feel like nothing on my lips, the colour is brown with hint of gray so it'll need makeup to go with the lip color.

reviews.review_title: Not the colour in the photo.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I only give this 4 stars because the colour shown really doesn't match the colour in the tube.  The actual lipstick is a much more coral pinky tone and not what I though I was getting.  Don't get me wrong, I love Gucci lipsticks and with my last order this holiday discount season I think it brings my total up to 11 so I will be returning this one.

reviews.review_title: My favorite lipstick formula, I usually hate matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the formula on these lipsticks. I want to slowly get them all. They are super comfortable to wear on the lips, you literally forget they are there. And they last really well, I touch up after I eat, but can even go without touching up with drinks. The color selection is also super interesting, I really am loving Gucci lipsticks, the colors are so interesting and slightly different.   They do have a bit of a smell, but I cant smell it as much with the matte as with the satin or worse the sheer lipsticks. But honestly I have grown to like it. And the packaging is spectacular. Its a well done luxury product I enjoy using. Cant wait to see what other colors they come up  with and please bring back Louise Orange 307 in matte it was so beautiful.   I used to be obsessed with the satin and sheer line, but now I see the matte line is really what its all about. So pigmented and comfortable and beautiful. Wears great as a stain on its own, topped with a gloss, a balm, or worn more opaquely as a strong lip. Very versatile product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS COLOR!! IT GLIDES ON SMOOTH AND DOES NOT GET FLAKY, I GOT MANY COMPLIMENTS ON IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very light weight for a matte lipstick. Smells Divine and luxurious. Good wearability. Has not dried out my lips. Love that their vegan! The packaging is beautiful and sturdy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is pretty, definitely not as dark as it looks in the swatch though. I’d call this more of a creme lipstick, didn’t dry to a matte finish. I got about 5 hours of wear working in a call center & normal daily activities.

reviews.review_title: it was so right, but the. so wrong
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered 3 different shades and they were all stunning. I haven't been able to find any shades like this elsewhere. But what I absolutely could not stand. It was floral and smelt like a lady who has vinyl coating her couches. If you catch my drift. Not only was it the smell of the lipstick but also the taste which matched the smell. It wouldn't have been as bad if the smell went away after a bit but no...that scent like lingers. Maybe Gucci can make a scent free line or a better smell then this because this was gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend got me this as a part of my anniversary gift and his choice was perfect! The colour is beautiful. It’s not too dark and its not too light. I wore it during date night and got so many compliments!

reviews.review_title: Note to self: Don’t buy lipstick online
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this lipstick is velvety, smooth, and doesn’t tug on your skin. However, I think something is off about Sephora’s labeling of the colors. I ordered #208, but what I got was something much lighter and not anything that resembles the description—written and visual—although it is the color I ordered. This experience is yet another reminder that it unless you have a light complexion, never buy lipstick online. I understand that individual screens make it really difficult to match colors, so I go by how the swatches look on black/darker skin tones, to be safe. But what I thought was a “warm rosewood” actually looks like a coral when on my lips. Ugh.  That said, the formulation is divine. I hope you have better luck than I did when it comes to color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly the best lipstick I own. I have Chanel, YSL, M.A.C. Abs others, but nothing compares to Gucci! It literally stays on all day. I’m in the process of purchasing more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this red lipstick. I debated for months before picking this up and I am so glad I ended up getting it. It’s an orange based red and is just super flattering on my skin tone. Very comfortable formula and I find it to be pretty long lasting. Only thing I will say, I don’t consider this matte. I blot 3 times after applying to get it to be what I consider matte. I guess it’s a comfort matte or whatever but I like matte matte red lipstick so I blot and then it’s matte to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick has the most amazing wear.  I put it on in the morning before my open house and it literally lasted all day and kept my lips so moisturized and smooth I really can't believe it since it is a matte  Finish which is usually drying.  I ate and it did transfer but it left the loveliest stain and and it looked good somehow like magic.. When it finally was almost off I just added a glass and it created the most prettiest color I truly love this lipstick stick. The color matches perfectly with my magenta shirt.. extra plus.   The 1st pic is the freshly applied look. The 2nd is after it became a stain with gloss on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous colour. Love the packaging and the texture of the lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Strong violet scent and taste- color was patchy and not long lasting for a matte lipstick, not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a high end lipstick junkie I had pretty high hopes for this lipstick. The color is pretty but this smells very strong and tastes like perfume and the smell unfortunately stays while you wear it. Also I found this formula quite drying compared to other matte lipsticks. If you want a great lipstick that is matte and performs well, go for Charlotte Tilbury or Pat McGrath. Not worth the $$$

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would never thought that I’d purchased a lipstick from Gucci because it is quite pricey, but I’m glad I did! I have super dry lips. As much as matte lipsticks are my favourites, they show every cracks and lines on my lips which I’ve learnt to accept it. However, this matte lipstick isn’t dry at all! It feels so comfortable on lips, and it doesn’t enhance the lines on my lips as much. This colour They met in Argentina is so beautiful, it’s such a beautiful peach nude shape! The photo doesn’t adjust its beauty, you need to try it by yourself to see it! I love this formula very much, even though it is pretty pricey but I am going to purchase a couple of other colours no matter what. It hurts my wallet for sure, but the formula, the colours, it’s too hard for me to stay away from them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect nude every time u wear I get compliments on this lipstick  a little on the grey side but amazing  Just a tad drying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci Matte Lipstick Color 703 Toni Purple - dark purple.. She Is A Little Dark And Vampy But Beautiful Not For The Faint Of Heart A Fearless Must Have!!  Now that the pandemic is just about under control and some of us can go maskless.. Lets make this Color 703 Toni Purple - dark purple work for us $42.00 worth it !! reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy formula, packaging could be WAY better... going today to exchange it... because it snapped in half second use! Do better GUCCI

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is so beautiful and I like how it feels on my lips, BUT on my fifth time using it, the lipstick broke off. It sucks because it’s so pretty, and it was the first time any lipstick had ever done that to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful, BUT it leaves marks a LOT. It’s matte but not fully, so the marks are unavoidable. Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes I got it because it’s Gucci and yes because of the packaging BUT the formula is perfection.  I don’t say this lightly and normally can’t wear mattes as they are too drying and actually make my 62 year old mouth look more wrinkled BUT not this formula. One stroke and that’s it and it lasts. I’m a blue red or dark pink girl and have the following colors Cassie Magenta, Three Wise Girls, Eadie Scarlet, Love Before Breakfast. I also purchased the satin formula as well for when I want a little shine.   One word of advise if you have a problem with matte lipsticks - there is nothing like Algenist Liquid Lip Collagen to prevent lips from drying, cracking, and truly plumps while creating a smooth base once dried. I did purchase all of the above myself. I live in hot dry Arizona and cannot live without the Algenist Lip Collagen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect matte formula without that drying and cracking feel. It’s amaaaazing! I have a few shades and cannot wait to buy more. In my opinion, it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I got this shade! I saw a picture of @vikeejeah wearing this shade and thought it was beautiful! I'm #390 Fenty foundation...this shade shows up a bit too bright for me...like a liner would seal the deal, BUT I still love the brightness of it without a liner. And in photos, this color looks great!   For a matte it's incredibly fluid. Like, it moves on my lips like a cream but stays matte. I drank juice from a can, ate a slice of pizza and this shade was still hanging strong!   It has a floral scent if that matters to you. It smells luxurious to me, and I don't mind it. I'm definitely going to be purchasing more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice matte texture, feels comfortable and wears well.  Not super long lasting but doesn’t dry out like some mattes.  Wish Gucci had a better shade range for neutral cool skin tones...a lot of other nudes in the line seem very warm or brownish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick feels very luxurious on your lips. It is a soft creamy matte that does not dry your lips out and is very pigmented. It feels like GUCCI on your lips. This lipstick is not transfer proof so when you do eat and drink it will transfer and reapplying this lipstick will be necessary. For those who don’t like products with scent, this lipstick may not be for you because it does have a floral scent to it. The shade I purchased is Peggy Taupe, it is a GORGEOUS Mauve pink shade that I can see myself wearing everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell, look and the consistency of this formula. The color painted veil is so beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got 505 Janet Rust. I love the way this lipstick feels, it has the matte appearance but doesn’t feel like it at all. It’s creamy and very moisturizing. The only reason why I didn’t give it a 5 star is due to the colour. I’m light with warm undertone and this looks very orange on me, more orange than red. Picture online does not reflect true colour but I guess that’s what happen when shopping online. I will be returning this for another colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A splurge for me but very worth it! amazing soft creamy texture and full pigment color. I want to get more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So pigmented I only have to use a small amount and it doesn’t make my lips feel dry like other matte lipsticks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I wasn’t expecting to like this lipstick as much as I do because I legit have at least eight different red lipsticks from different brands (I’m obsessed with red lipsticks *shrugs*) but let me tell you this one right here is worth every penny! If saying hey it’s me give me all your attention type of attention your looking for then go get yourself one of these because everywhere I go wearing this I have everyone’s full attention. It’s an intense, long lasting red. Only con I would say it has, it’s the flowery smell which I personally don’t mind but I know not everyone likes scented lipsticks. So now I need to go buy some other shades. Thanks Gucci and Sephora!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It tastes and smells like perfume. They Met in Argentina is actually more peach than rosewood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this nude! I was a bit hesitant in buying it, I seen it on someone on Instagram and they swore by it they were not lying. The color applies perfectly. Such a nice texture. The only downfall for me was the floral scent, grabbed a cloth and removed it I can taste the scent in my mouth yuck! Other then that it’s a perfect nude

reviews.review_title: This Gucci may not be the Gucci you know
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not impressed with this product at all, especially at this price point. Gucci evokes in my mind, luxury and indulgence. This product is dry, does not apply well, and feathers like crazy, even with lip liner. It's drying also. I will stick with my Lancome lipsticks. They are a true indulgence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you love red lipstick, this is the one for you. It is smooth, creamy, doesn’t smudge and is so flattering. Expensive, but defiantly worth the price. Lips don’t look chapped. I recommend using any red lip liner with it just to keep it completely on your lips if you’re going to eat/drink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Janie scarlet is a beautiful rich blue red. I’m sure it looks amazing on everyone but its an exceptionally gorgeous red on brown girls. It’s comparable to MAC’s ruby woo but the shade is richer and the formulation is way less drying than ruby woo. I’d describe it as a comfortable matte. The packaging is luxurious too. Janie scarlet is now my go to red lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for years for my perfect red. Odalie red from Gucci is it! I love the matte finish, light floral fragrance and super bright red color. It just makes me happy to put it on! The tube is a nod to vintage cosmetics when things felt glamorous and lovely. The formulation is truly matte, but not drying. It has good staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: application is so soft, smooth like butter, perfectly beautiful  red, lovely luxurious packaging, i found the scent is a bit strong for me I might return this.    (the dupe for this color is Russian red Mac bullet lipstick)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the best matte bullet lipsticks I’ve tried. It really is worth every penny. It’s highly pigmented and glides on like buttery velvet on the lips. I do have to say it is kind of scented. It’s not anything overpowering and long lasting, and just a light floral smell. I personally like the scent and I kept wanting to put more on. It is hydrating as well and sits very comfortably.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The imperial green is so rich and beautiful! Even across the quality of a video call, I instantly got compliments on the color. It goes on very evenly and smoothly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say that not only is the packaging beautiful but the color is absolutely gorgeous and it feels so soft on my lips and I surprisingly really love the scent it has .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a couple of different shades of this lipstick but Peggy Taupe would have to be my favorite. It’s nice pretty color on my skin tone it looks more pink than taupe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick shade was very pretty, I wouldn’t say this is a matte lipstick, it has some creamy ness to it. The shade 305 Ruby Firelight can be best described as a dull orange pink. It’s kind of pastel, the shade on tan skin look bright. But the color is dull has no shimmer no shine. It’s just a dull color. I like it tho, I don’t have something like this shade. Would recommend this lipstick but maybe In a different shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is beautiful and powdery. Goes on smooth and stays on. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lipstick Sephora carries by far. It’s like applying velvet to your lips. The pigment carries a bang and is long lasting. The matte finish is gorgeous without dehydrating my lips. My only complaint is that my wallet doesn’t love the price tag, but I can surely justify buying this lipstick as it is worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is luscious OMG. I’m officially hooked on Gucci. Just purchased a Hermes lipstick and found Gucci is far superior. Will be adding more to my collection for sure. Colour works on my fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IN LOVE with this lipstick. Got this complimentary for testing purposes. Would not have tried it otherwise as I am normally a lip gloss person. Lipstick usually has a oily smell and feels sticky to me. NOT this one! Loved the applicator tube, so swanky and LOVED the color and how smooth it glided on. Hubby loved the color and definitely noticed it right away! Its a bit pricey for my budget but worth the splurge!

reviews.review_title: The Most Comfortable Matte Lipstick I've Tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.  To start, I have fair skin with rosacea and my lips are normal (not dry). I tried the Gucci Rouge à L\evres Mat Lipstick in 201 The Painted Veil and I’m not going to lie, this has to be one of the most comfortable matte lipsticks I’ve ever tried. It really does deliver the velvety feel it claims to.  It’s somewhat transfer proof (tested this by kissing the top of my hand), but it doesn’t claim not to be. I could still feel it on my lips after 3 tests.  This is a lipstick that won’t last as long as a liquid lip, so if you want the full pigmented color you first apply, it’s definitely one you should throw in your purse or bag to reapply throughout the day!  When it comes to if I would recommend it, I would say to those who can afford a $42 lipstick and want to experience Gucci makeup, go for it! But I would also say, don’t feel the need to break the bank as there are definitely other lipsticks out there that can be a dupe for this!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am usually quite minimal when I wear make up, and often steer clear of lipstick. I just really don’t like how lipstick dries out and gets caked in the corners of my mouth, but this! Oh man, this lipstick is AMAZING! Super smooth and creamy and doesn’t dry out or feel like you need to reapply. I highly  recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for testing purposes only. It is my first time trying any lipstick from the Gucci brand and I must say I was impressed with how smooth and bright the color is. The packaging is also lovely a bit on the heavy side but lovely. I sure recommend this product. I myself would to try other colores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this from Influenster complimentary for review purposes only and wanted to really take time to try it out before reviewing and I must say, I do like this lipstick, it is a very comfortable matte lipstick and I love the color, it glide on really smoothed on my lips, I think it has a slight scent but I couldn’t fully picked up on it, I love the shade of nude this is but I’m not sure if I would buy it again, yes I do love it but for a luxury prod that’s $42 I have other lipsticks from high end brands and drugstores that are the same if not similar

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was scared to use this product because I didn’t want to love it. Let’s just say my nightmare came true. I love this product. This was my first time ever wearing Gucci makeup and now I am addicted. The application was so smooth. I was a little afraid that the color wouldn’t go with my skin complexion but it proved me wrong. I’m looking to buy more of their lipstick because now I’m boujie lol. S/n: I did use a brown lip liner as the base on the outer parts of my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes. I also do not wear lipstick. I tried this on and did not like the color at first but it slowly grew on me and did look nice. It did not stay on as long as I hoped it would have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Gucci Rouge à L\evres Mat - Goldie Red lipstick from Influenster to try. First of all, I absolutely LOVE this color, perfect bright red lipstick for the holidays. I was pleasantly surprised by how creamy, smooth, and soft it felt on my lip. It has a matte finish but does not dry out my lip at all and goes on very smooth. I’ve never purchased from Gucci Beauty because of the price tag to be honest, but the packaging feels very luxurious. Pros: beautiful color, creamy, soft, comfortable wear, lux packaging, staying power is okay although it seems to bleed/transfer to my mug. Cons: high price tag (retail price of $42) and fragrance (it smells old to me if you know what I mean. I personally prefer fragrance-free cosmetics).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm genuinely surprised by how much I liked this! I've never purchased Gucci makeup before and didn't know what to expect. I'm really surprised by the staying power it has; it didn't transfer onto the inside of my mask at all, and even though it looks matte, it doesn't have that really dried-down, crusty feeling. idk if I'll buy it myself because of the price tag, but I definitely plan to keep using this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Lots of color options, theres a color for everyone. The application is creamy, smooth, and matte. I have dry lips and this is pretty forgiving. It also has a fragrance which I don't mind. I recommend this for a gift or just to treat your self!

reviews.review_title: Impressive for an expensive prestigious brand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic luxurious packaging. Definitely brightens my day when I reach for this. Although the 505 Janet rust is a bit more orange and red hue, it goes on smooth with a matte finish. The staying power is about 2-3 hours for me if I don't drink water without a straw or start eating something. I did notice that it bleeds easily onto the straw/paper cup/plastic cup of my beverage of choice. Pro tip: Make sure to blot your lips of any excess color that may bleed!   There's also a heavy fragrance in this lipstick, that's a bit unbearable to me when I'm wearing a mask. BUT WHY WEAR LIPSTICK and a mask? Because I'm used to putting something on so I look pulled together and not dull without color on my face that's why. #complimentary #influenster #gucci #rougealevresmat I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn’t normally buy a luxury brand lipstick but the quality is noticeable. First of all, the tube is substantial and pretty. The lipstick itself has a soft, pleasant scent and goes on the lips like SILK. It has a nice, saturated color but is so lightweight that I kept forgetting I had it on, and my lips felt moisturized. There was some color loss after eating a meal, but not entirely. Otherwise it wore well all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best lipsticks ever! It smells so good, it’s soft and creamy, non drying and it lasts all day! You can’t ask for a better formula! The Janet Rust suits my skin tone perfectly !  I’m already shopping for my next shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very smooth, creamy & soft with a matte finish. I don’t enjoy the color of the lipstick against my complexion; therefore, I removed it as quickly as I applied it. I’m unable to to confirm if the wear is long lasting. Because I do love the smooth application, I may attempt to pair the lipstick with a nice dark liner or purchase in a different color to give it a fair chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lipstick (shade: 201 Painted Veil) for free as part of a promotion. Pros: Buttery soft to apply, didn’t dry out my lips, shade was a great nude (I’m white, usually a light neutral in foundations, it was more nude that it looked like online). Cons: if your lips aren’t perfectly smooth it accentuates the imperfections, needs reapplication fairly frequently, is expensive (retails for $42 on Sephora), and smells like my grandmother’s perfume. While I will continue to wear it, I would not purchase this product (the biggest negative for me is the smell).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shade that compliments my skin tone. The matte lipstick is not too drying & doesn’t define my lip lines, which I love the most about this product. The lipstick is also somewhat moisturizing for my lips. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes. I’m not usually the type to try expensive lip products, but I am super glad I received this lipstick! The gold packaging is super luxurious and beautiful, and the lipstick is a gorgeous color as well even though it’s not a color I would wear on the daily. Application was smooth and easy, no overbearing scents which was great as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has been a while since I have used a regular lipstick, I mainly use liquid. I received this to try and it felt really nice! Smooth and creamy not drying at all. I'm medium to tan and this was a great nude in me. I actually bought a regular side truly love the shade! It did come off but just a little was able to eat and drink and have still some on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is beautiful. The packaging looks sleek and sophisticated, and the formula is is silky but still matte. Excellent color payoff and lasts without needed to touch up too much throughout the day. I wasn’t a huge fan of the smell other then that I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is amazing! It was sooooo silky smooth when I put it on and after blotting it away it turned into a matte lipstick and stayed on for hours! I didn’t realize it was matte and got so excited when I was able to successfully wear it under my mask without any transfer! I haven’t tried matte lipsticks since they came out with the liquid lipsticks but this has really made me re-consider a matte regular lipstick again. I love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first high quality lipstick i have received and wow! It goes on so smooth, doesn't dry out my lips and lasts for several hours without having to reapply. I love the classic red look and how bold it is without being overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is worththe price.One of the modt beautiful lipsticks with amazing shades for all skin types The texture isn't drying for your lips even though it's matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receieved this lipstick complimentary from Influester. Texture is 5 stars. Velvety and powdery - not dry or chalky. Feels great on the lips, glides on well. Wears nicely. The packaging of it also gives it a very luxe look. Overall really impressed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with the classic looking packaging by Gucci, but of course I expected nothing less from them. The lipstick itself has a wonderful, light fragrance to it and it glides on really smooth. The color was a nice shade that I feel like could be used by a various of skin tones, but my only negative on the lipstick was that it came off too easily and it had to be reapplied a lot throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This @Gucci lippie was one of the most lovely lipstick I've ever had a chance to ever wear I'm very thankful that I was sent this product complimentary by @influenster to do a review and give my honest opinion I love it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So when I received this lipstick, I thought, it’s a $42 lipstick, how a lipstick be worth $42? Well friends, I will tell you how, and it’s the formula.   My favorite lipstick is CT pillow talk, and this one is even better. It’s smooth, it’s creamy, it’s clearly only as drying as is absolutely necessary, and it stays on. If you play your cards right and apply it with enough time to set, it will only barely get on a mask too, so you can enjoy your lipstick for hours (I got around 5-6 hours out of mine with eating and drinking and mask wearing).   The color! This color is a beautiful pink, kind of nude but brighter. It’s lovely on me (fair, cool toned).  Other than the price (#worthit), there is one drawback, which is the fragrance, Which is like an old lady’s perfume. But it goes away quickly, thankfully.   I would never have considered a lipstick to be worth this much but this is just a fantastic product. I may have gotten it complimentary, but I am always honest in reviews no matter what. And I kinda love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Im actually really impressed with this! It comes in a sturdy tube. Classy looking. The lipstick itself is a nice chunky size. I hope that makes sense. Not the consistency but the lipstick itself when winding it up to put on is chunky. A normal lipstick is pretty thin. This is at least size and a half of normal. It’s beautiful! Wears nicely. Not as well as a liquid lipstick so I wouldn’t suggest eating a greasy burger with it confidently, but it’s nice! Not drying. Color is bold and not patchy. Overall really impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the vibrant red color of this lipstick.  It has a slight fragrance.  The matte finish is nice and it goes on smooth and easy.  It has long wear but does bleed a little like most red lipsticks do.  The packaging is gorgeous.

reviews.review_title: lovely texture, stingy amount of product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is 5 stars. Velvety and powdery - not dry or chalky. Feels great on the lips, glides on well. The colors are gorgeous, the pictures are accurate and the color seen is how it looks on your lips. However, I gave 4 out of 5 overall because I did not like how much product you have to use to get an opaque lip. One application and you can see some of your lips, had to apply two coats to get the right effect. I can imagine going through this very quickly. I am not a daily wearer but be advised if you are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is the best I’ve ever used! It’s incredible! I have dry lips & it keeps them moistened all day & really lasts! Did I mention the packaging? So gorgeous! Talk about high end, other brands don’t even compare. It’s definitely worth the money. You can see tiny crystals in it when you look up close. Beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receieved this lipstick complimentary from Influester in exchange for my honest review. This lipstick knocks it out of the park by design alone. The casing is beautiful yet subtle. The tube feels heavy and luxurious, like you know you bought an expensive, valuable lipstick. This shade, Goldie Red, is killer. The bright red color is vibrant, deeply pigmented and gorgeous. This lipstick doesn't not bleed nor does it transfer.   What is equally impressive is that this matte lipstick is not trying and actually feels like it provides some hydration. I wore this lipstick for 8 hours, eating and drinking and had to use a makeup wipe to get it off, it is bullet proof. Very impressed with this formula as well. Well worth the price for timeless beauty and quality formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick applies very smooth and glides easily on the lips. The formula is very moisturizing and hydrating despite it being a matte. The color applied very sheer, so I had to build it up to cover my lips evenly. I was comparing it to Pat McGrath 1995, which instantly applies full pigment upon initial application and is similar in shade. I also didn’t really like shade 201: The Painted Veil against my skintone, so I wouldn’t wear it confidently without a brown lip liner. Would I recommend the formula? Definitely! Overall, it’s a nice lipstick that I received complimentary from Influenster for review.

reviews.review_title: Your lips but better in a matte finish.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Warm pinky rose color. Definitely matte so do the whole ritual before applying lol applicator isn’t out of this world(basic). Scent isn’t the best as it kind of smells like a grandma. It doesn’t linger but still, for its retail value it should be a better scent or no scent at all... I received this products via INFLUENSTER & Gucci  for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say I love the consistency of this lipstick - it has great pigmentation and does not dry my lips! The packaging of it also gives it a very luxe look and feel- in fact my mom wanted to steal this from me as soon as she saw me open my Influenster package when I got this for free to review. The only issue I have with this particular product is the color - it’s a tad more orange than I believe I can pull off. I would personally opt for a more pink or berry color, but overall (despite the high price point), I would recommend this to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Truly enjoy the soft matte of this lipstick sometimes I feel lipstick in matte can be a bit heavy or much. I was also pleasantly surprised when I smelt the lipstick of a very light floral scent, I try to find lipsticks that don’t have a plastic or chemical smell and this has won me over!!! The design of the lipstick as a whole is lovely, a classic item for your everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this formula! The high end quality shines thru! The color is perfect for a mauvy nude. Definitely would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I could not be more than in love with this lipstick I loved the veil color is beautiful and lasts a long time, it feels moisturizing but it looks matte, it looks beautiful, the packaging is also beautiful and very elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the shade, loved the feel of the lipstick, love how the lip stick hydrated my lips although being a matte. The only downside, and the reason this lipstick didn't get a 5 star was because the lipstick is not an all day wear. It was one that you needed to reapply, and if the formula was a bit different and was an all day wear this would by far be the very best lipstick that I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The new Gucci Matte finish lipstick is gorgeous. I received the color Janet Rust which is a rusty red color (more natural looking) and I thought it was beautiful! The texture is like velvet and applies so smoothly, and is truly matte. I only gave 4 stars because of the price, it is definitely a luxury item, but well worth it if you want to spoil yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade 209 , it’s the perfect nude for my skin tone . This is a nice lipstick , it’s not to matte . It does have slight floral sent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the gold lipstick cylinder, it's gorgeous! As for the lipstick itself, I love the application and how the longevity of the product. It applies very smooth and doesn't bleed like many other brands. I love the color, it's not my favorite but I'm excited to purchase other colors to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color Love before breakfast is more pink than cranberry which is fine but I couldn’t get passed the strong perfume smell. I’m ok with fruit or vanilla fragrance from my lipsticks but this is a flowery perfume smell. It performs very well but you can pay less from other brands that give the same color pay off without the flowery smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression was how gorgeous the packaging was. A slightly heavy tube and so much detail. The brand engraved on the cap as well as on the lipstick itself. Upon trying it on, I was immediately shocked at how smooth it went on. The color was vibrant and slightly bold yet subtle and elegant. It had a pleasant fragrance and a matte finish. Throughout the day, the color stayed but my lips didn’t dry out. I had several compliment my lip color, such a unique color. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Janet Rust! Very cute, and smooth! Smells like my grandmother...whom I miss. Last as expected with any lipstick. Wish it would last a bit longer. Packaging is amazing. I would totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked how this glided on so there wasn't any tugging. Even though it has a matte finish, there's a hydration like feel to it. The finish is smooth but I would definitely recommend a liner especially for my fellow deeper tone beauties.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color great for all skin tones. Smooth and the perfect matte.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a complimentary product sent to me from Influenster for review. I want to start out by saying that I’m a HUGE matte lipstick fan and was so excited to try this. The packaging is stunning, the color is beautiful and it kept my lips moisturized. But...I had a really hard time getting it to not look splotchy. For the price, $42, I would definitely not purchase one in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Gucci lipstick from Influenster and I couldn't be any happier. I usually wouldn't wear a red shade of lipstick but this one looks great on me. I was worried about it smearing or ending up on my teeth but that was no issue with this lipstick. It lasted up to 5 hours and that including eating and drinking. I will definitely be buying other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First, the packaging is beautiful. It is very good quality. Second, I’m very particular about my matte lipsticks. They usually dry my lips out. Not this one. It is super buttery. The color is amazing. For my skin tone it looks amazing. Third, I’m in love with this lip. It’ll be my new go to lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Influenster sent me this Gucci lipstick in shade Janet Rust 2 days back. Since I was sent a color I would never pick out for myself I wanted to wait until I had a day where I could wear it all day without having to leave the house.  The gold lipstick tube is very eye catching pretty and sturdy.  It is slightly magnetic so it won't come apart very easily in your purse.     The lipstick itself has pretty little shimmering sparkles that you can see when you turn it back and forth in the light.  It applied so smoothly and effortlessly and gave me about 5 hours of wear time with eating and drinking.  While this color was definitely not for me ( I look horrible in all red lip shades) I will absolutely be buying myself a few more neutral colors ( Peggy Taupe and The Painted Veil) that will go with my skintone!!

reviews.review_title: Heavy on scent but very pigmented
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soft matte formula but heavily scented. The scent does go away after a few minutes but you can smell it as your applying. It goes on very pigmented and smooth. The color is pretty and the formula is not drying at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula it makes my lips super soft it goes very smoothly  its high pigment ,less transfer, the best part is it keeps ur lips hyderated.. The color is bomb is orange red and gives you that confident

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: let me start with the packaging. the tube is beautiful and snaps closed tightly. I love how Gucci is scripted along the product itself. as for the formula, rich and pigmented. one swipe across each lip is all it takes. Even the smell is nice. Formula is nice and creamy and you can hardly feel it. As for the color, not for me. That is no reason though to give it a negative review as I am sure it looks beautiful on women who have the right look for a bright lipstick. I look better with neutrals and mauve colors. But the lipstick itself is beautiful and I will be purchasing it next time I need lipstick. of course I will pick another color, but this is the best formula I have ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It goes on nice and smooth. It comes in a pretty good case. The goldie red was a bit bright for me, but it is good to get out of my comfort zone. It did come off some when I atedrank. It did not dry out my lips but was not necessarily moisturizing either.  I did receive a free sample of this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: oh. my. goodness. i feel POWERFUL. i have fair skin and this color and formula makes me feel like a boss. It is very soft, high pigment, low transfer, etc. It glides on very easily and is absolutely. It is pricey but in my opinion worth it. Better than other high end lipsticks I've tried. Please note that i received this product free in exchange for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster. It’s a beautiful velvety and pigmented Orange-brown-red matte lipstick that doesn’t feel drying at all. There is a tiny bit of transfer but the product hasn’t smeared at all or gotten on my teeth. You also don’t need much product to get full coverage. It feels very luxurious and the gold applicator is very chic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried to upload a photo to show but it didn’t work. I am of light to medium skin tone and this lipstick looks so pretty on me. I think it would look gorgeous on a darker skin tone. Just a beautiful color. Price point is high but what do you expect from a Gucci product. I highly recommend!
