reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let alone do we love some Gucci, this is actually a beautiful powdery matte, doesn't bleed; Especially for such a bright red. My mom enjoys this lipstick as well. Don't hold back from using it because of it's price or name to it. It would help to have just a little bit of lip balm under, or do a lip mask prior!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Longue tenue tr\es hydratant j'adore ce produit que je recommande

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the prettiest, most comfortable matte orange that I own. It’s so luxurious and I am in love. I have 3 Gucci lipsticks and I plan to order 3 more very soon. Don’t sleep on Gucci. The mattes dont tug on your lips like most matte lip formulas. It’s very comfortable and the staying power is real; I sipped water from a straw and from the bottle and I still had on lipstick. I really love these and it was worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this brown and the formula is so nice too. Would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful bold color goes on easily and not to drying for a matte. I only didn’t rate five stars because the amount of lipstick in the stick, very stingy. Color and wear is very comparable to Mac’s “Lady Danger”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic lipstick. Very comfortable, staus on lips, don't bleed and pigmentation is top !

reviews.review_title: hydrates and leaves the lips looking soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s very pigmented and it’s not drying on your lips which is amazing! I am obsessed and can’t wait to buy more colours

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 401 Three Wise Girls - intense pinky red
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very beautiful and vibrant color! The packaging is super sleek and cute with the gold. The formula is also nice and smooth and builds well. The formula also holds up well against eating drinking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the packaging on this lipstick! The color on me is a beige nude, but I absolutely love it! The formula is smooth and builds up very nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick. It feels so comfortable (cushiony) and applies smoothly. The packaging has some weight to it, so it feels lux. If you are around my skin tone (Fenty 410) Mona Leslie Cameo color will look gorgeous on you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application: Smooth Matte Finish: Less than a minute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci released lipsticks and I’m so happy. I’m in love with the pigment that they give and how buttery they feel. Gucci lipstick is my new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My most favorite lipstick so far, for a matte there’s still some moisture to it and my lips.  It has a light but pigmented color on my lips.  There is little transfer if you kiss someone but you may need to reapply after a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would have liked to see just a tad bit more product, but overall my favorite purchase of lipstick so far! The color is very pigmented, for a matte there’s still some moisture to it and my lips to feel heavy or dry. And very very light transfer, gave my toddler a kiss and you could barely tell I had given her one. It’s also a lot brighter of a red then I would have expected so if you’re going for more of a darker red this isn’t it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product arrived damaged HOWEVER Sephora staff was quick to respond and quickly gave me a replacement. Excellent customer service. Besides that this color is beautiful and smooth while not drying to the lips at all. Worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me set the scene, my boyfriend of five years and I just broke up, I’m drunk with my best friend and order this lipstick online from Sephora. Man that was the best decision of my life (the lipstick not the breakup although that wasn’t bad either) it arrives the night before what would have been our anniversary. It’s like the Gucci gods want me to have a good day anyways. This lipstick has not failed me. The way it glides onto your lips will make you choose to wear this lipstick instead of kissing another person. The package is so sleek and gives me total vintage vibes which I’m into. Normally I would expect a color like this to fade, and it does after a little wear but nothing even close to the tragic lipstick fade that I was expecting. So in conclusion break up with your boyfriend and kiss this lipstick instead of him.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect color and texture. The tube is classy and stays closed and has that classic vintage lipstick smell. Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_title: Matte and comfortable just not fully opaque
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful shade of orange and for reference I wear M17 Pat McGrath foundation/NARS Sheer Glow in Syracuse. I was hoping it would be opaque enough to cover the discoloration on my lips. It doesn’t and I would need to pair this with a pencil to cover the discoloration but if that’s not your concern, this lippie is for you! Also there’s a strong fragrance at Ford application so keep that in mind if you have a sensitive nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy, smooth, and last all day. Impeccable formula. I want to buy more shades. I’m hooked. My lips were incredibly soft by the end of the day. The color was the perfect shade of orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It went on fine, but in one hour, it's patchy and dry. And it begins feathering around the edges. If you use gloss on it forget it. Really a very poor quality. Ill stick to Chanel lipsticks. I got sucked in with all the good reviews. It's not a good lipstick formula at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipstick. The formula feels soft and doesn’t dry out your lips but looks matte. The Goldie red has such a beautiful payoff. The packaging is also very beautiful. I never right reviews but was very impressed. Can’t wait to wear this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is so smooth and literally feels like nothing. I usually hate lattes but this one has the most amazing texture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful and it stays on!  I get compliments each time I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: identified as matte but this is a satin very greasy Sephora needs to get the descriptions done correctly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would love to purchase, but it seems all four of the purple shades have their swatches mixed up. I don't want to pick a shade and then have it delivered the wrong color. You would pick the lavender shade and it would show women in a deep plum, and then pick the plum shade and the women would be wearing bright lavender.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Harry wore this lipstick, so I will wear this lipstick

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 208 They Met in Argentina - warm rosewood
reviews.review_text: I saw Harry Styles wearing Gucci lipstick in the shade They Met in Argentina so I bought Gucci lipstick in the shade They Met in Argentina

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Harry styles wore this so I bought it, hope it’s good lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is awful. Makes it look like you have foundation stuck on your lips. Goes on smooth but color is just a no. I received the color 103 coral beige  I received this lipstick complimentary from influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_title: Would recommend for lighter skin tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn’t use this as a lipstick personally I feel like it doesn’t stay well on me. Can use as a contour or concealer type tho. I’m a little darker in skin tone so I feel like with nude or beige colors I don’t pull it off too well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface this review by saying this is lipstick, not a liquid lipstick. Notoriously classic lipsticks don't have the longevity of a liquid lip. Having said that, this lipstick is wonderful! Beautiful, weighted tube and many variations of color. This is a matte color which means your lips should be well moisturized and exfoliated or else flaky lips could shine through. This lipstick (I have Carol beige) lasts until eating where it wears away uniformly. I layer it with MAC stone lip liner and sometimes use this color as an accent on the middle of the lip to highlight. This product feels luxe and I have enjoyed using it. I did receive this complementary for reviewing purposes but that does not sway my review in any way. I take my cosmetics very seriously. Try it and if you don't like it, return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci made a really great lipstick. It applies so smooth, it smells great, and it doesn't feel dry. I wish I received a different color, because the color in the photo applies lighter than expected (at least it did for me). Overall, the lipstick was amazing and I didn't expect anything less from such a high end brand.   Note: I recieved this product complimentary to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this color! It was a bright orangey red on my skintone, I usually don’t like bullet lipsticks but this one was amazing. Color goes on smoothly and was easily buildable to a coverage that I liked. Packaging felt heavy and of good quality and product left my lips feeling soft and smooth. This product was sent to me complimentary of Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is simply gorgeous. I am in love with the vintage packaging. It reminds me of my grandma’s old lipstick collection. I knew this lipstick would be amazing because Gucci doesn’t disappoint. The quality and packaging alone makes it worth the splurge. It’s a bit on the pricy side, but if you find your signature shade don’t think twice! Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved thw formula. The shade is a bit to light to be worn on its own but great for mixing. I recieved this item free for review from influenster  and was very excited to try it. It didnt disappoint!  Definitely would recommend this lipstick to any makeup lover!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I've been looking for!! It's so hard to find this shade of new.  Of course, it's not a color you wear on its own, but in my opinion it's necessary for the base of all my nude combos.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: kay, first of all, I love the packaging of this Gucci lipstick. It SCREAMS luxe with the gold container and chic modern design. The lipstick has a bit of a weight to it that makes it feel luxurious too. Secondly, I am all about traditional matte red bullet lipsticks and this one is definitely one of my favorite ones that I own. This color is a blend of blue and red tones which makes my teeth look more white and what I believe to compliment many skin tones. I've worn it three times, all for special occasion, and have received multiple compliments on it. And lastly, I love that this lipstick is creamy enough to reapply over my lips after I eat or drink and doesn't leave any roll ups or patchy feeling either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this lipstick is stunning and looks lovely a top the vanity! My biggest gripe with this lipstick was that the product was slightly wobbly in the bullet, making application slightly precarious. The texture was wonderful and unique however after a few hours of wear it does tend to feel drying. Overall if wearing for a few hours this formula is pretty comfortable! The best way I’ve found to apply this is mixing in with a lip liner or a satin/creme lipstick which increases it’s staying power and adds this beautiful soft matte affect to other lipsticks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of this lipstick however the formula was somewhat a fail for me. I noticed it dried out my lips if I wore it for a long time period. Using it for a couple hours is fine but I wouldn’t wear for an all day everyday lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the way that this lipstick felt on my lips. It wasnt drying or caking, however that being said the color pictured and the actual color of the product is different. I found this shade to be much lighter, and I needed to add a liner as a base coat otherwise the color disappeared on my skin tone. I will say, having this on all day with the liner I did not need to reapply all day.  I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_title: 3 reasons why I dont love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got shade Goldie Red to test complimentary, so I could give an opinion of the product. I was not impressed with this matte lippie. First for the price point that this is offered at, the color payoff was difficult to achieve. I had to apply 4x on upper and lower lips for it to be a smooth, opaque coverage. Second, the rose smell is overwhelming. I did not expect the product to have a smell, but it does and it lasted for at least 20mins on my lips. I highly dislike the smell of Rose's, when it comes to cosmetics, so I had to take the product off since I was getting a migraine after 20 mins of wear time. Finally, for the lipstick to have the name goldie rose, I thought it would be have red with a golden undertone on my lip, but alas, it was more orange than anything and made me look washed out. If you love, and I mean love the smell of rose cosmetics, try this product, it comes in many shades, but i will not be buying this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the matte finish on my lips, but the color definitely felt like she would be called Carol. She was beautiful, but she just felt beige. Beautiful packaging and a beautiful tube made me love the lipstick more than I thought I could. I received it in an Influenster Voxbox and I’m glad I did. I can’t wait to try other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lipstick in an Influenster Box and have to say it’s one of my favorite lip items I have received! While the color is not one that I typically would choose for myself I love the formula. It goes on smooth, doesn’t feel drying or sticking. It does require Some re-applying throughout the day but overall I will continue using it! Plus, the tube is gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of the most comfortable matte formula lipsticks I've tried. I received it in my influenster #complimentary #voxbox and fell in love with how it felt and lasted on my lips, it was just the color I was sent disappeared on my lips. It's literally the shade of my skin, so not a very flattering shade. But I think other shades would be ideal and I'm excited to try others out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very matte lipstick. Goldie red is honestly a little more orangey than what I would consider a true red. While the color isn't great against my skin, it is still very pretty. Usually when I wear matte lipstick, I add just a tiny bit of lip balm underneath to keep my lips from feeling dry; you cannot do that with this lipstick. the lipstick ended up getting goopy and running off my lips! it did apply much better without any bit of lip balm, but it made my lips feel tight and dry. For me, this lipstick is a miss, but if you can tolerate matte lipsticks without any under layer this may be a go-to for you!   I received this product complimentary from Gucci and Influenster in exchange for a review, however, my opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous packaging, absolutely love the look of the lipstick but this shade just didn’t work for me.  I have very pale skin and this lipstick gave off a grayish tint which made me feel like my lips looked old and worn out.  Would love to try other colors as the texture was nice and I loved the way the lipstick felt.  The only thing I did not love was the color.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula. Super creamy, non drying. Comfortable for daily wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan. Not sure if it is the color. The picture makes it look more of a brown but has a strong gray hint to it.  I received this item for free for review. The color hue is not a great look. It almost seemed to look like when your lips are chapped and dry. ( I tried this on multiple different skin tones). The texture of it felt more like crayon and chalky. I would like to review other colors to determine if it was just the color that threw me off. I do think the packaging and details are beautiful though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lipstick complimentary from Influenster. It goes on really smooth feels like velvet, the color is pretty it looks more of an red orange when I applied it.  I would purchase it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous application and finish. Glides on smoothly and doesn’t cling to dry skin like other matte lipsticks can do. The Golidie Red shade is stunning but looks a little jarring on my olive skin tone so I will be trying it again in one of the more neutral tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed by this lipstick! It was a gorgeous color, applied smoothly and the color lasted through drinking and eating all day. I am definitely buying in other shades ! I received this product for free on Influenster for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this matte lipstick of intense color, has long duration, the perfect red color, with an elegant packaging that catches all eyes.  The formula is matte, very comfortable and moisturizing.

reviews.review_title: A beautiful nude shade for true olive skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous deep nude color that is perfect for Mediterranean coloring. A creamy matte lipstick. I'd been searching for this particular nude shade forever! Worth the price. High quality formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I recieved this lipstick from influenster complimentary for testing purposes. I had already been eyeing these lipsticks but I typically am not a matte lipstick fan so I would have never tried this otherwise! First I love the packaging. It reminds me of the beautiful packaging vintage makeup used to have. The lipstick applies like a creme and glides on effortlessly. The shade Carol Beige is a very light nude but doesnt give me the dreaded concealer lip look. It wears nicely, doesnt feel dry, and feels like I have nothing on my lips. The information in the box says it can also be worn on the eyes or cheeks which I haven't tried yet, but am curious to try to use it every way I can! I'm definitely going to try out other shades!

reviews.review_title: Matte lipstick with a silky smooth application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product from Influenster to test out. I was a little hesitant and first given how dry it looks in the tube. Upon application it went on like a cr\eme lipstick. It felt smooth and silky, yet has a matte application. The lipstick is light weight and keeps my lips feeling hydrated, and best of all, it survives even the largest of sandwiches. I will 10/10 buy. And the packing is amazing. It give it a classic feel to a classic red lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice lipstick. You can tell this is a high end lipstick straight out the gate with the packaging. The gold bullet has some good weight to it, the lipstick itself also has a slight texture to it. It almost looks suede but goes on smooth. The formula is nice it’s mate but not trying, opaque but not too thick. The color on me is a little too cool to wear alone but on top of a warmer lipliner it looks perfect. If you’re in the market to splurge on a lipstick I recommend this one.

reviews.review_title: The SMELL is what I can’t get past.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh Gucci. I wanted to love this. I really did. In theory, I loved it but I would never purchase this product again. The color was nice but didn’t work for me with my skin tone. The formula is VERY DRY (which is somewhat to be expected due to its matte formula) but the SMELL. It  reminded me of makeup that my grandma wears. So artificial and just terrible. It never faded either! I smelled it the whole time I wore it and it lasted awhile (which is great if the most important part to you is longevity). I just couldn’t do it personally and really wouldn’t recommend to anyone unless smells don’t bother you at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i Received Gucci Matte lipstick in Beige from Influenster for an honest review.  The lipstick is smooth, soft and glides easily.  Leaves a beautiful mattte finish.  I LOVE the gold packaging, what a luxurious touch.  I also liked the staying power of the lipstick through eating drinking and the day.  I will definitely buy this in a slightly brighter color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Gucci rouge a levers May lip color, Goldie red. It looks and feels great! The color is just the right amount of red/gold and it stayed on even while eating and drinking. The lip color never felt dry or like it was cracking. I recommend this lip color to anyone who enjoys wearing red!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this lipstick complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. This lipstick is very nice. Goes on smooth and has bright pigmentation. Only issues I have is it doesn't last long at all and came in the mail broken. I recommend this lipstick..just make sure to purchase it in person and not mail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was alright. Very matte. Shows creases in lips very bad.

reviews.review_title: This color is not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick does feel luxurious, it’s very creamy and glides on your lips. It has a perfumy smell that I don’t mind, but some people might. The reason why I’m only giving 3 stars is due to the color. I received mine in Carol Beige, which is the worst nude color for my complexion. It looks chalky one my lips. The only way I think this color would work is if I use it as a topper in the center of my lips over a dark color. To give an ombr\e look. I did receive this product free gift free charge for me honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and the feel of this lipstick. The packaging is gorgeous. For the price I would have hoped it wore a little longer but it's not terrible. I got this product complimentary for Influencer for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lipstick as a free trial from influencer, I must say for a matte finish it did not leave my lips dry or flaky. It Went on smooth and felt very silky.  I loved the red color and it stayed looking great for most of the day.  I would recommend to this product.  Bonus the container is super cute and very Sophisticated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick goes on super smooth, wears beautifully, and this powerful red shade is an instant confidence boost. Compliments all skin tones, and is absolutely worth the buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There is nothing like wearing a good classic red lipstick. I loved the color and how it looked

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful formula, beautiful texture. Most matte formulas leave my lips feeling dry and looking cracked. This formula doesn't, and it lasted through coffee and lunch.  Did it last all day? No. Did it last through the work day? It was still clinging on by the time I was done for the day. I docked a star because of the color but that's me being petty. The color washed me out by itself. It did look like a beautiful base for my lip glosses though! However the lip gloss negated the staying power. I received this lipstick as a complimentary product through influenster, but I can say that it's worth the price.  In fact, I will be purchasing more, just perhaps in other more flattering shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this one. Great color. Great consistency. Stays on for the longest. I would buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product free for reviewing purposes. However I’m always honest about any product I review or try.  I love the packaging. The sleek gold and the little accents of Gucci on the lid and the lipstick itself gave it a little extra “umph” in my opinion. It went on super smoothly and effortlessly. Making sure to do all the proper makeup prep steps my lipstick ended up lasting me almost the entire day. I had to touch up once however that was mostly due to me getting sticky caramel on my bottom lip. Oops. My only issue was the color. I’m fair skinned and this beige was a bit too light for me. It washed me out and just did not look right on me. I plan to try and purchase a mauve or dusty rose color for myself whenever I can. Makeup Mallory gives this lipstick 10 out of 10 kittykisses! I would definitely recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everything about this lipstick is luxe, from the beautiful gold packaging to the formula itself. On first appearance it looks as if it's going to feel very matte but as soon as you put it your lips it goes on so amazingly smooth, it actually almost feels like an oil until it sets down. The color I received is a very light nude, i am very pale and the color still kind of looks like an off colored concealer on my lips unfortunately, with that being said I don't think it could be a shade for anyone to wear on its own honestly. I'm going to try it again with a darker lip liner or maybe in the center of another lip shade to create on ombre effect. I gave this 3 stars because the main issue i had with this product is that it gives me butt hole lips I think because the product has so many emolients and is so creamy it just doesn't want to cover my whole bottom lip and butt hole lips is never cute and even if I chose a different shade I don't think it would make a difference. The other reason I marked it so low is the color itself/its undertone itself is gonna be hard for anyone to wear.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Gucci lipstick is a truly great matte lipstick. I received it as trial product to review through Influenster. The packaging is beautiful and the metal exterior is a luxurious touch. It has a velvety matte finish without being too dry, and is highly pigmented. What impressed me was that it lasted well through eating and wears well for a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: fall in love with Gucci Matte lipstick. Color is very beautiful and lasts all day long. Although lipstick is matte, it still hydrates my lips. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great consistency (not drying, smooth) but the most awful color. Makes me look like I’ve been dead for a month. Might look great on someone else though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was nervous when I first saw the lipstick.. cuz it just didn’t seem very easy to apply.. But thankfully I was wrong (thank god) lol Very nice color! Lasts long! I was able to put a thin layer on so I won’t be going to work with nightclub lips lol  Would be better if more moist and can apply more evenly  Ps. Received this product for free for testing purpose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this beautiful lipstick for free thanks to Influenster;  It was my first free gift and I was very anxious, but when I saw that beautiful red lipstick wowwww and even more how beautiful it is;  I suffer from dryness on my lips and this moisturized lipstick is quite fascinated! Thanks Influenster and tanks Gucci too!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick glides on beautifully, and shows up very matte. The packaging is super slick and fancy. The shade however is not for light skin tones like me, but I know would look beautiful on a different complexion. This is worth a great soft lipstick choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Goldie Red shade has such a Beautiful color and formula! I love how easy it is to apply and it goes very well with my fair skin. I also like that it is wearable, I can wear it with a day to day outfit but also for an event! Only reason I gave it four stars is the lipstick easily comes off, wish it didn’t transfer as easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lip product! I absolutely love this lipstick! It’s the most beautiful matte shade without being overly bright. It just delivers the right amount of color and it’s got a lot of pigment and it has major lasting power. I love this lipstick and I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lipstick for my honest review from Influencer. First of all the packaging makes me feel like a queen, so beautiful. Upon putting it on, I have to say this is the nicest feeling lipstick I've ever tried. You'd never guess it was a matte lipstick by the way it feels. It's so smooth and creamy. My only disappointment was the color I was sent. It doesn't show up well against my complexion. It's a beautiful color, and looks just like the image online as on my lips. I tried it over some pink lip liner after my first try, and it showed up a little better against my skin. I highly recommended this lipstick, and will be buying myself one as soon as i finish my review here. It also would make a great gift.

reviews.review_title: Love almost everything about this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For starters, the packaging is beautiful and the top does have a bit of weight to it. I enjoyed the way this matte lipstick feels it was the smoothest  lipstick I have ever put on in my LIFE! However, I got the color Carol Beige and honestly I won’t wear this shade a lot as it’s not very versatile with different looks. I would purchase or recommend to a friend. I did receive this product complimentary for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this to try out in exchange for my honest opinion, so here it is! This matte lipstick is very moisturizing. It take a little while to fully dry, but once it dries it has definite staying powder. I absolutely love the formula. The one star off is just for the color. Honestly red is not my favorite and if choose to do a red, I prefer a darker, cooler red tone. This is a bit much for me. I will definitely be checking out their other colors. I will also use it with a deeper red lip pencil and I think it will look great for a fancy make up night. The packaging is all gold! Definitely a beautiful, luxury packing Great job with this Gucci.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing matte red that isn’t drying ! I love this formula and the color. The actual bullet packaging is classy and a good weight as well. It’s a nice statement piece to have in your clutch for a night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! If you’re going to splurge on lipstick - this one is great. I thought it was going to be super bright based on the color in the tube, but the color is surprisingly buildable. It was also more of a red / orange on my lips than I thought it would be. I’m not usually into matte lipsticks because my lips are so dry but this one is great! Very comfortable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this! It is super smooth and pigmented! The package feels luxurious and expensive! My only concern is the smell is potent.

reviews.review_title: A matte that’s not overly dry!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster and I am VERY pleasantly surprised. I love a good matte lip, but as someone who struggles with dry and cracked lips often, most dry my lips out even more, or accentuate the rough texture. This is the most moisturizing Matte lipstick I’ve ever tried. It goes on so smooth and has a beautiful red color. Definitely need a lip liner, even if it’s clear, to keep it from fanning around the edges, but I would splurge on this in a good nude as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from influenster and I am absolutely in love!!!  I am more fun to matte lipsticks as they stay longer but they tend to cake up! This lipstick on the other hands could not be more perfect as it glides on so smoothly, feels as if it is a nourishing your lips as soon as it touches them and last four st least 5 hrs before having to re apply!  Last but definitely not least it does not slots and it is absolutely gorgeous highly recommended to anybody who wants to have pretty nourished without a doubt in their mind that their lips are on fleek lipstick you hand hot to try the GUCCI!!!!  I absolutely love nude colors and this matches so well with my skin at feels so good I cannot brag about this lipstick and enough. Thanks to influence or I will be purchasing another one where then the week because I just have to try at least 2 more colors! #Influencester #GUCCI

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the creamiest matte lipstick I own! It keeps your lips feeling moisturized. With this color a little goes a long way and you need to use a lip liner or it bleeds like crazy. *i recieved this product free for promotional purposes

I love this lipstick! I wore it all evening at a wine festival and it held up super well! I love the matte look. It does not rub off or flake. The deep red color was exactly what I was looking for. This is a high quality lipstick that I would recommend to everyone!  *I received this product free of charge for promotional purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is amazing! It goes on so smoothly. It’s matte, but does not leave your lips dry. It is creamy and a little goes a long way! It is the perfect red lip! I’m obsessed with the packaging as well! How could you not be?! Thanks to @influenster for the complimentary sample! I will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Other than such a beautifully pigmented lipstick, it is very long lasting. I always lick my lips so I usually only wear lip balm. However this lipstick actually kept my lips hydrated despite being matte. I love it and I recommend it if you can afford it since it’s in the higher price range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to review for influenster and I must say although this would not be a color I would particular pick myself, I really love it for just the center of the lip. It's a little too light to do a full lip for my skin tone anyway but I will be using this as a combo for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live it! It’s a super soft creamy consistency with a nice matte finish! Goldie red is a beautiful bright red which I’m super happy about because I normally wear bright red and pink colors and this shade is perfect! Big thanks to @influenster for sending me this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is amazing. At first I wasn't too fond of the shade by looking at the pictures but when I received it from influenster the color is lighter than it depicts here and is a perfect shade of nude. Lasts so long and doesn't budge or fade. It also isn't drying on the lips being matte.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25* Goldie Red - the gucci red matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lipstick, the formula, the shade and the packaging are all great. It’s matte but it doesn’t dry my lips out and has a pleasant scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Formula is great, shade, not so great.   I loooove the formula of this lipstick. It’s so creamy and moisturizing without compromising on the matte finish. The shade washed me out. I’m sure it would look beautiful on different skin tones, but it just looked grey on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color would be a good color for contouring but not a lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not normally enjoy bullet lipsticks. Normally I only like liquid lipsticks that are not drying but dry down and last all day. This is the first bullet lipstick I actually like. It last through rubbing eating and drinking. It goes on very nicely, and you don't have to worry about it coming off. A price point is kind of high for one lipstick oh, but you definitely get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this lipstick. It glides on perfectly on the lips and give a great color payoff. The shade is have is shade 25 Goldie red in matte finish, it’s the perfect red color on would associate with Gucci. You don’t get any crease lines and no flaking either and I applied it on somewhat chapped lips. Everyone needs this formula of lipstick in their lives! I received this as a complimentary gift from influenster and Gucci, I’m so glad I did because I am going to buy more shades from this line. I will definitely recommend this to all my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes as this was my first time ever using Gucci makeup. I am excited to have received this lipstick complimentary from Influenster for product testing. The color I received Carol Beige looks much darker on screen than in person. The color is almost leaning towards a chalky grayish color, like taupe. There isn’t even a hint of coral here. I decided to line my lips with a cafe pencil, add a pinkish dark nude on the outter most part of my lips then add this lipstick to the middle for dimension. It wasn’t a bad but but not a favorite. It takes more blending and manipulation than I find reasonable to make this look good on brown skin, but I suspect the warm red would look amazing on me. The gold packaging is beautiful and looks and feels like luxury; its of great quality (not the usual plastic feel). The lipstick has a heavy fragrance. It’s a pretty scent but it’s heavy enough to bother me after a few hours. Speaking of hours, I wanted to give this lipstick a proper full day wear test but I need to figure out a game plan because it’s quite drying. It’s not a matte that allows you to forget its there, however, I plan to give it another try because I’d like to see how long it lasts and if it can hold up against dinner this weekend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this lipstick. Applies smoothly, very pigmented and vivid. The color is long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can't say enough about this product beautiful color and smooth buttery texture long lasting   love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this lipstick by a lovely girlfriend and let me tell you it is bomb and worth every penny! It doesn’t bleed. It sets without drying your lips. It doesn’t crack and the undertones look so well with olive skin tones. It’s just a beautiful creamy color! The packaging is also beautiful as expected from Gucci.

reviews.review_text: beautifully pigmented, I ate taco bell with this on and it was still there afterwards...that’s all you need to know

reviews.review_text: beautiful undertones of blue within the red, which is very flattering.

reviews.review_text: kawaii color,very beautiful. deep red! very good. natural matte

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect nude! I love this formula! Feels amazing for a true matte finish. Very comfortable and does not bleed. Some “mattes” can be too drying or they never really set matte. This one does both! Wears pretty well but I personally do not mind touching up.
